5022 * @ctxt: an XML parser context
5023 *
5024 * DEPRECATED: Internal function, don't use.
5025 *
5026 * Parse an XML (SGML) comment. Always consumes '<!'.
5027 *
5028 * The spec says that "For compatibility, the string "--" (double-hyphen)
5029 * must not occur within comments. "
5030 *
5031 * [15] Comment ::= '<!--' ((Char - '-') | ('-' (Char - '-')))* '-->'
5032 */
5033void
5034xmlParseComment(xmlParserCtxtPtr ctxt) {
5035 xmlChar *buf = NULL((void*)0);
5036 size_t size = XML_PARSER_BUFFER_SIZE100;
5037 size_t len = 0;
5038 size_t maxLength = (ctxt->options & XML_PARSE_HUGE) ?
5039 XML_MAX_HUGE_LENGTH1000000000 :
5040 XML_MAX_TEXT_LENGTH10000000;
5041 xmlParserInputState state;
5042 const xmlChar *in;
5043 size_t nbchar = 0;
5044 int ccol;
5045 int inputid;
5046
5047 /*
5048 * Check that there is a comment right here.
5049 */
5050 if ((RAW(*ctxt->input->cur) != '<') || (NXT(1)ctxt->input->cur[(1)] != '!'))
5051 return;
5052 SKIP(2)do { ctxt->input->cur += (2),ctxt->input->col+=(2
); if (*ctxt->input->cur == 0) xmlParserGrow(ctxt); } while
(0);
5053 if ((RAW(*ctxt->input->cur) != '-') || (NXT(1)ctxt->input->cur[(1)] != '-'))
5054 return;
5055 state = ctxt->instate;
5056 ctxt->instate = XML_PARSER_COMMENT;
5057 inputid = ctxt->input->id;
5058 SKIP(2)do { ctxt->input->cur += (2),ctxt->input->col+=(2
); if (*ctxt->input->cur == 0) xmlParserGrow(ctxt); } while
(0);
5059 GROWif (ctxt->input->end - ctxt->input->cur < 250)
xmlParserGrow(ctxt);;
5060
5061 /*
5062 * Accelerated common case where input don't need to be
5063 * modified before passing it to the handler.
5064 */
5065 in = ctxt->input->cur;
5066 do {
5067 if (*in == 0xA) {
5068 do {
5069 ctxt->input->line++; ctxt->input->col = 1;
5070 in++;
5071 } while (*in == 0xA);
5072 }
5073get_more:
5074 ccol = ctxt->input->col;
5075 while (((*in > '-') && (*in <= 0x7F)) ||
5076 ((*in >= 0x20) && (*in < '-')) ||
5077 (*in == 0x09)) {
5078 in++;
5079 ccol++;
5080 }
5081 ctxt->input->col = ccol;
5082 if (*in == 0xA) {
5083 do {
5084 ctxt->input->line++; ctxt->input->col = 1;
5085 in++;
5086 } while (*in == 0xA);
5087 goto get_more;
5088 }
5089 nbchar = in - ctxt->input->cur;
5090 /*
5091 * save current set of data
5092 */
5093 if (nbchar > 0) {
5094 if (buf == NULL((void*)0)) {
5095 if ((*in == '-') && (in[1] == '-'))
5096 size = nbchar + 1;
5097 else
5098 size = XML_PARSER_BUFFER_SIZE100 + nbchar;
5099 buf = (xmlChar *) xmlMallocAtomic(size);
5100 if (buf == NULL((void*)0)) {
5101 xmlErrMemory(ctxt, NULL((void*)0));
5102 ctxt->instate = state;
5103 return;
5104 }
5105 len = 0;
5106 } else if (len + nbchar + 1 >= size) {
5107 xmlChar *new_buf;
5108 size += len + nbchar + XML_PARSER_BUFFER_SIZE100;
5109 new_buf = (xmlChar *) xmlRealloc(buf, size);
5110 if (new_buf == NULL((void*)0)) {
5111 xmlFree (buf);
5112 xmlErrMemory(ctxt, NULL((void*)0));
5113 ctxt->instate = state;
5114 return;
5115 }
5116 buf = new_buf;
5117 }
5118 memcpy(&buf[len], ctxt->input->cur, nbchar);
5119 len += nbchar;
5120 buf[len] = 0;
5121 }
5122 if (len > maxLength) {
5123 xmlFatalErrMsgStr(ctxt, XML_ERR_COMMENT_NOT_FINISHED,
5124 "Comment too big found", NULL((void*)0));
5125 xmlFree (buf);
5126 return;
5127 }
5128 ctxt->input->cur = in;
5129 if (*in == 0xA) {
5130 in++;
5131 ctxt->input->line++; ctxt->input->col = 1;
5132 }
5133 if (*in == 0xD) {
5134 in++;
5135 if (*in == 0xA) {
5136 ctxt->input->cur = in;
5137 in++;
5138 ctxt->input->line++; ctxt->input->col = 1;
5139 goto get_more;
5140 }
5141 in--;
5142 }
5143 SHRINKif (((ctxt->progressive == 0) || (ctxt->inputNr > 1)
) && (ctxt->input->cur - ctxt->input->base
> 2 * 250) && (ctxt->input->end - ctxt->
input->cur < 2 * 250)) xmlParserShrink(ctxt);;
5144 GROWif (ctxt->input->end - ctxt->input->cur < 250)
xmlParserGrow(ctxt);;
5145 if (ctxt->instate == XML_PARSER_EOF) {
5146 xmlFree(buf);
5147 return;
5148 }
5149 in = ctxt->input->cur;
5150 if (*in == '-') {
5151 if (in[1] == '-') {
5152 if (in[2] == '>') {
5153 if (ctxt->input->id != inputid) {
5154 xmlFatalErrMsg(ctxt, XML_ERR_ENTITY_BOUNDARY,
5155 "comment doesn't start and stop in the"
5156 " same entity\n");
5157 }
5158 SKIP(3)do { ctxt->input->cur += (3),ctxt->input->col+=(3
); if (*ctxt->input->cur == 0) xmlParserGrow(ctxt); } while
(0);
5159 if ((ctxt->sax != NULL((void*)0)) && (ctxt->sax->comment != NULL((void*)0)) &&
5160 (!ctxt->disableSAX)) {
5161 if (buf != NULL((void*)0))
5162 ctxt->sax->comment(ctxt->userData, buf);
5163 else
5164 ctxt->sax->comment(ctxt->userData, BAD_CAST(xmlChar *) "");
5165 }
5166 if (buf != NULL((void*)0))
5167 xmlFree(buf);
5168 if (ctxt->instate != XML_PARSER_EOF)
5169 ctxt->instate = state;
5170 return;
5171 }
5172 if (buf != NULL((void*)0)) {
5173 xmlFatalErrMsgStr(ctxt, XML_ERR_HYPHEN_IN_COMMENT,
5174 "Double hyphen within comment: "
5175 "<!--%.50s\n",
5176 buf);
5177 } else
5178 xmlFatalErrMsgStr(ctxt, XML_ERR_HYPHEN_IN_COMMENT,
5179 "Double hyphen within comment\n", NULL((void*)0));
5180 if (ctxt->instate == XML_PARSER_EOF) {
5181 xmlFree(buf);
5182 return;
5183 }
5184 in++;
5185 ctxt->input->col++;
5186 }
5187 in++;
5188 ctxt->input->col++;
5189 goto get_more;
5190 }
5191 } while (((*in >= 0x20) && (*in <= 0x7F)) || (*in == 0x09) || (*in == 0x0a));
5192 xmlParseCommentComplex(ctxt, buf, len, size);
5193 ctxt->instate = state;
5194 return;
5195}
5196
5197
5198/**
5199 * xmlParsePITarget:
5200 * @ctxt: an XML parser context
5201 *
5202 * DEPRECATED: Internal function, don't use.
5203 *
5204 * parse the name of a PI
5205 *
5206 * [17] PITarget ::= Name - (('X' | 'x') ('M' | 'm') ('L' | 'l'))
5207 *
5208 * Returns the PITarget name or NULL
5209 */
5210
5211const xmlChar *
5212xmlParsePITarget(xmlParserCtxtPtr ctxt) {
5213 const xmlChar *name;
5214
5215 name = xmlParseName(ctxt);
5216 if ((name != NULL((void*)0)) &&
5217 ((name[0] == 'x') || (name[0] == 'X')) &&
5218 ((name[1] == 'm') || (name[1] == 'M')) &&
5219 ((name[2] == 'l') || (name[2] == 'L'))) {
5220 int i;
5221 if ((name[0] == 'x') && (name[1] == 'm') &&
5222 (name[2] == 'l') && (name[3] == 0)) {
5223 xmlFatalErrMsg(ctxt, XML_ERR_RESERVED_XML_NAME,
5224 "XML declaration allowed only at the start of the document\n");
5225 return(name);
5226 } else if (name[3] == 0) {
5227 xmlFatalErr(ctxt, XML_ERR_RESERVED_XML_NAME, NULL((void*)0));
5228 return(name);
5229 }
5230 for (i = 0;;i++) {
5231 if (xmlW3CPIs[i] == NULL((void*)0)) break;
5232 if (xmlStrEqual(name, (const xmlChar *)xmlW3CPIs[i]))
5233 return(name);
5234 }
5235 xmlWarningMsg(ctxt, XML_ERR_RESERVED_XML_NAME,
5236 "xmlParsePITarget: invalid name prefix 'xml'\n",
5237 NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0));
5238 }
5239 if ((name != NULL((void*)0)) && (xmlStrchr(name, ':') != NULL((void*)0))) {
5240 xmlNsErr(ctxt, XML_NS_ERR_COLON,
5241 "colons are forbidden from PI names '%s'\n", name, NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0));
5242 }
5243 return(name);
5244}
5245
5246#ifdef LIBXML_CATALOG_ENABLED
5247/**
5248 * xmlParseCatalogPI:
5249 * @ctxt: an XML parser context
5250 * @catalog: the PI value string
5251 *
5252 * parse an XML Catalog Processing Instruction.
5253 *
5254 * <?oasis-xml-catalog catalog="http://example.com/catalog.xml"?>
5255 *
5256 * Occurs only if allowed by the user and if happening in the Misc
5257 * part of the document before any doctype information
5258 * This will add the given catalog to the parsing context in order
5259 * to be used if there is a resolution need further down in the document
5260 */
5261
5262static void
5263xmlParseCatalogPI(xmlParserCtxtPtr ctxt, const xmlChar *catalog) {
5264 xmlChar *URL = NULL((void*)0);
5265 const xmlChar *tmp, *base;
5266 xmlChar marker;
5267
5268 tmp = catalog;
5269 while (IS_BLANK_CH(*tmp)(((*tmp) == 0x20) || ((0x9 <= (*tmp)) && ((*tmp) <=
0xa)) || ((*tmp) == 0xd))) tmp++;
5270 if (xmlStrncmp(tmp, BAD_CAST(xmlChar *)"catalog", 7))
5271 goto error;
5272 tmp += 7;
5273 while (IS_BLANK_CH(*tmp)(((*tmp) == 0x20) || ((0x9 <= (*tmp)) && ((*tmp) <=
0xa)) || ((*tmp) == 0xd))) tmp++;
5274 if (*tmp != '=') {
5275 return;
5276 }
5277 tmp++;
5278 while (IS_BLANK_CH(*tmp)(((*tmp) == 0x20) || ((0x9 <= (*tmp)) && ((*tmp) <=
0xa)) || ((*tmp) == 0xd))) tmp++;
5279 marker = *tmp;
5280 if ((marker != '\'') && (marker != '"'))
5281 goto error;
5282 tmp++;
5283 base = tmp;
5284 while ((*tmp != 0) && (*tmp != marker)) tmp++;
5285 if (*tmp == 0)
5286 goto error;
5287 URL = xmlStrndup(base, tmp - base);
5288 tmp++;
5289 while (IS_BLANK_CH(*tmp)(((*tmp) == 0x20) || ((0x9 <= (*tmp)) && ((*tmp) <=
0xa)) || ((*tmp) == 0xd))) tmp++;
5290 if (*tmp != 0)
5291 goto error;
5292
5293 if (URL != NULL((void*)0)) {
5294 ctxt->catalogs = xmlCatalogAddLocal(ctxt->catalogs, URL);
5295 xmlFree(URL);
5296 }
5297 return;
5298
5299error:
5300 xmlWarningMsg(ctxt, XML_WAR_CATALOG_PI,
5301 "Catalog PI syntax error: %s\n",
5302 catalog, NULL((void*)0));
5303 if (URL != NULL((void*)0))
5304 xmlFree(URL);
5305}
5306#endif
5307
5308/**
5309 * xmlParsePI:
5310 * @ctxt: an XML parser context
5311 *
5312 * DEPRECATED: Internal function, don't use.
5313 *
5314 * parse an XML Processing Instruction.
5315 *
5316 * [16] PI ::= '<?' PITarget (S (Char* - (Char* '?>' Char*)))? '?>'
5317 *
5318 * The processing is transferred to SAX once parsed.
5319 */
5320
5321void
5322xmlParsePI(xmlParserCtxtPtr ctxt) {
5323 xmlChar *buf = NULL((void*)0);
5324 size_t len = 0;
5325 size_t size = XML_PARSER_BUFFER_SIZE100;
5326 size_t maxLength = (ctxt->options & XML_PARSE_HUGE) ?
5327 XML_MAX_HUGE_LENGTH1000000000 :
5328 XML_MAX_TEXT_LENGTH10000000;
5329 int cur, l;
5330 const xmlChar *target;
5331 xmlParserInputState state;
5332
5333 if ((RAW(*ctxt->input->cur) == '<') && (NXT(1)ctxt->input->cur[(1)] == '?')) {
5334 int inputid = ctxt->input->id;
5335 state = ctxt->instate;
5336 ctxt->instate = XML_PARSER_PI;
5337 /*
5338 * this is a Processing Instruction.
5339 */
5340 SKIP(2)do { ctxt->input->cur += (2),ctxt->input->col+=(2
); if (*ctxt->input->cur == 0) xmlParserGrow(ctxt); } while
(0);
5341
5342 /*
5343 * Parse the target name and check for special support like
5344 * namespace.
5345 */
5346 target = xmlParsePITarget(ctxt);
5347 if (target != NULL((void*)0)) {
5348 if ((RAW(*ctxt->input->cur) == '?') && (NXT(1)ctxt->input->cur[(1)] == '>')) {
5349 if (inputid != ctxt->input->id) {
5350 xmlFatalErrMsg(ctxt, XML_ERR_ENTITY_BOUNDARY,
5351 "PI declaration doesn't start and stop in"
5352 " the same entity\n");
5353 }
5354 SKIP(2)do { ctxt->input->cur += (2),ctxt->input->col+=(2
); if (*ctxt->input->cur == 0) xmlParserGrow(ctxt); } while
(0);
5355
5356 /*
5357 * SAX: PI detected.
5358 */
5359 if ((ctxt->sax) && (!ctxt->disableSAX) &&
5360 (ctxt->sax->processingInstruction != NULL((void*)0)))
5361 ctxt->sax->processingInstruction(ctxt->userData,
5362 target, NULL((void*)0));
5363 if (ctxt->instate != XML_PARSER_EOF)
5364 ctxt->instate = state;
5365 return;
5366 }
5367 buf = (xmlChar *) xmlMallocAtomic(size);
5368 if (buf == NULL((void*)0)) {
5369 xmlErrMemory(ctxt, NULL((void*)0));
5370 ctxt->instate = state;
5371 return;
5372 }
5373 if (SKIP_BLANKSxmlSkipBlankChars(ctxt) == 0) {
5374 xmlFatalErrMsgStr(ctxt, XML_ERR_SPACE_REQUIRED,
5375 "ParsePI: PI %s space expected\n", target);
5376 }
5377 cur = CUR_CHAR(l)xmlCurrentChar(ctxt, &l);
5378 while (IS_CHAR(cur)(((cur) < 0x100) ? (((0x9 <= ((cur))) && (((cur
)) <= 0xa)) || (((cur)) == 0xd) || (0x20 <= ((cur)))) :
(((0x100 <= (cur)) && ((cur) <= 0xd7ff)) || ((
0xe000 <= (cur)) && ((cur) <= 0xfffd)) || ((0x10000
<= (cur)) && ((cur) <= 0x10ffff)))) && /* checked */
5379 ((cur != '?') || (NXT(1)ctxt->input->cur[(1)] != '>'))) {
5380 if (len + 5 >= size) {
5381 xmlChar *tmp;
5382 size_t new_size = size * 2;
5383 tmp = (xmlChar *) xmlRealloc(buf, new_size);
5384 if (tmp == NULL((void*)0)) {
5385 xmlErrMemory(ctxt, NULL((void*)0));
5386 xmlFree(buf);
5387 ctxt->instate = state;
5388 return;
5389 }
5390 buf = tmp;
5391 size = new_size;
5392 }
5393 COPY_BUF(buf, len, cur)if (cur < 0x80) buf[len++] = cur; else len += xmlCopyCharMultiByte
(&buf[len],cur);
5394 if (len > maxLength) {
5395 xmlFatalErrMsgStr(ctxt, XML_ERR_PI_NOT_FINISHED,
5396 "PI %s too big found", target);
5397 xmlFree(buf);
5398 ctxt->instate = state;
5399 return;
5400 }
5401 NEXTL(l)do { if (*(ctxt->input->cur) == '\n') { ctxt->input->
line++; ctxt->input->col = 1; } else ctxt->input->
col++; ctxt->input->cur += l; } while (0);
5402 cur = CUR_CHAR(l)xmlCurrentChar(ctxt, &l);
5403 }
5404 buf[len] = 0;
5405 if (ctxt->instate == XML_PARSER_EOF) {
5406 xmlFree(buf);
5407 return;
5408 }
5409 if (cur != '?') {
5410 xmlFatalErrMsgStr(ctxt, XML_ERR_PI_NOT_FINISHED,
5411 "ParsePI: PI %s never end ...\n", target);
5412 } else {
5413 if (inputid != ctxt->input->id) {
5414 xmlFatalErrMsg(ctxt, XML_ERR_ENTITY_BOUNDARY,
5415 "PI declaration doesn't start and stop in"
5416 " the same entity\n");
5417 }
5418 SKIP(2)do { ctxt->input->cur += (2),ctxt->input->col+=(2
); if (*ctxt->input->cur == 0) xmlParserGrow(ctxt); } while
(0);
5419
5420#ifdef LIBXML_CATALOG_ENABLED
5421 if (((state == XML_PARSER_MISC) ||
5422 (state == XML_PARSER_START)) &&
5423 (xmlStrEqual(target, XML_CATALOG_PI(const xmlChar *) "oasis-xml-catalog"))) {
5424 xmlCatalogAllow allow = xmlCatalogGetDefaults();
5425 if ((allow == XML_CATA_ALLOW_DOCUMENT) ||
5426 (allow == XML_CATA_ALLOW_ALL))
5427 xmlParseCatalogPI(ctxt, buf);
5428 }
5429#endif
5430
5431
5432 /*
5433 * SAX: PI detected.
5434 */
5435 if ((ctxt->sax) && (!ctxt->disableSAX) &&
5436 (ctxt->sax->processingInstruction != NULL((void*)0)))
5437 ctxt->sax->processingInstruction(ctxt->userData,
5438 target, buf);
5439 }
5440 xmlFree(buf);
5441 } else {
5442 xmlFatalErr(ctxt, XML_ERR_PI_NOT_STARTED, NULL((void*)0));
5443 }
5444 if (ctxt->instate != XML_PARSER_EOF)
5445 ctxt->instate = state;
5446 }
5447}
5448
5449/**
5450 * xmlParseNotationDecl:
5451 * @ctxt: an XML parser context
5452 *
5453 * DEPRECATED: Internal function, don't use.
5454 *
5455 * Parse a notation declaration. Always consumes '<!'.
5456 *
5457 * [82] NotationDecl ::= '<!NOTATION' S Name S (ExternalID | PublicID) S? '>'
5458 *
5459 * Hence there is actually 3 choices:
5460 * 'PUBLIC' S PubidLiteral
5461 * 'PUBLIC' S PubidLiteral S SystemLiteral
5462 * and 'SYSTEM' S SystemLiteral
5463 *
5464 * See the NOTE on xmlParseExternalID().
5465 */
5466
5467void
5468xmlParseNotationDecl(xmlParserCtxtPtr ctxt) {
5469 const xmlChar *name;
5470 xmlChar *Pubid;
5471 xmlChar *Systemid;
5472
5473 if ((CUR(*ctxt->input->cur) != '<') || (NXT(1)ctxt->input->cur[(1)] != '!'))
5474 return;
5475 SKIP(2)do { ctxt->input->cur += (2),ctxt->input->col+=(2
); if (*ctxt->input->cur == 0) xmlParserGrow(ctxt); } while
(0);
5476
5477 if (CMP8(CUR_PTR, 'N', 'O', 'T', 'A', 'T', 'I', 'O', 'N')( ( ( ( ( ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 0 ] == 'N'
&& ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 1 ] ==
'O' && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 2
] == 'T' && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur
)[ 3 ] == 'A' ) && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->
cur)[ 4 ] == 'T' ) && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input
->cur)[ 5 ] == 'I' ) && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->
input->cur)[ 6 ] == 'O' ) && ((unsigned char *) ctxt
->input->cur)[ 7 ] == 'N' )) {
5478 int inputid = ctxt->input->id;
5479 SKIP(8)do { ctxt->input->cur += (8),ctxt->input->col+=(8
); if (*ctxt->input->cur == 0) xmlParserGrow(ctxt); } while
(0);
5480 if (SKIP_BLANKSxmlSkipBlankChars(ctxt) == 0) {
5481 xmlFatalErrMsg(ctxt, XML_ERR_SPACE_REQUIRED,
5482 "Space required after '<!NOTATION'\n");
5483 return;
5484 }
5485
5486 name = xmlParseName(ctxt);
5487 if (name == NULL((void*)0)) {
5488 xmlFatalErr(ctxt, XML_ERR_NOTATION_NOT_STARTED, NULL((void*)0));
5489 return;
5490 }
5491 if (xmlStrchr(name, ':') != NULL((void*)0)) {
5492 xmlNsErr(ctxt, XML_NS_ERR_COLON,
5493 "colons are forbidden from notation names '%s'\n",
5494 name, NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0));
5495 }
5496 if (SKIP_BLANKSxmlSkipBlankChars(ctxt) == 0) {
5497 xmlFatalErrMsg(ctxt, XML_ERR_SPACE_REQUIRED,
5498 "Space required after the NOTATION name'\n");
5499 return;
5500 }
5501
5502 /*
5503 * Parse the IDs.
5504 */
5505 Systemid = xmlParseExternalID(ctxt, &Pubid, 0);
5506 SKIP_BLANKSxmlSkipBlankChars(ctxt);
5507
5508 if (RAW(*ctxt->input->cur) == '>') {
5509 if (inputid != ctxt->input->id) {
5510 xmlFatalErrMsg(ctxt, XML_ERR_ENTITY_BOUNDARY,
5511 "Notation declaration doesn't start and stop"
5512 " in the same entity\n");
5513 }
5514 NEXTxmlNextChar(ctxt);
5515 if ((ctxt->sax != NULL((void*)0)) && (!ctxt->disableSAX) &&
5516 (ctxt->sax->notationDecl != NULL((void*)0)))
5517 ctxt->sax->notationDecl(ctxt->userData, name, Pubid, Systemid);
5518 } else {
5519 xmlFatalErr(ctxt, XML_ERR_NOTATION_NOT_FINISHED, NULL((void*)0));
5520 }
5521 if (Systemid != NULL((void*)0)) xmlFree(Systemid);
5522 if (Pubid != NULL((void*)0)) xmlFree(Pubid);
5523 }
5524}
5525
5526/**
5527 * xmlParseEntityDecl:
5528 * @ctxt: an XML parser context
5529 *
5530 * DEPRECATED: Internal function, don't use.
5531 *
5532 * Parse an entity declaration. Always consumes '<!'.
5533 *
5534 * [70] EntityDecl ::= GEDecl | PEDecl
5535 *
5536 * [71] GEDecl ::= '<!ENTITY' S Name S EntityDef S? '>'
5537 *
5538 * [72] PEDecl ::= '<!ENTITY' S '%' S Name S PEDef S? '>'
5539 *
5540 * [73] EntityDef ::= EntityValue | (ExternalID NDataDecl?)
5541 *
5542 * [74] PEDef ::= EntityValue | ExternalID
5543 *
5544 * [76] NDataDecl ::= S 'NDATA' S Name
5545 *
5546 * [ VC: Notation Declared ]
5547 * The Name must match the declared name of a notation.
5548 */
5549
5550void
5551xmlParseEntityDecl(xmlParserCtxtPtr ctxt) {
5552 const xmlChar *name = NULL((void*)0);
5553 xmlChar *value = NULL((void*)0);
5554 xmlChar *URI = NULL((void*)0), *literal = NULL((void*)0);
5555 const xmlChar *ndata = NULL((void*)0);
5556 int isParameter = 0;
5557 xmlChar *orig = NULL((void*)0);
5558
5559 if ((CUR(*ctxt->input->cur) != '<') || (NXT(1)ctxt->input->cur[(1)] != '!'))
5560 return;
5561 SKIP(2)do { ctxt->input->cur += (2),ctxt->input->col+=(2
); if (*ctxt->input->cur == 0) xmlParserGrow(ctxt); } while
(0);
5562
5563 /* GROW; done in the caller */
5564 if (CMP6(CUR_PTR, 'E', 'N', 'T', 'I', 'T', 'Y')( ( ( ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 0 ] == 'E' &&
((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 1 ] == 'N' &&
((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 2 ] == 'T' &&
((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 3 ] == 'I' ) &&
((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 4 ] == 'T' ) &&
((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 5 ] == 'Y' )) {
5565 int inputid = ctxt->input->id;
5566 SKIP(6)do { ctxt->input->cur += (6),ctxt->input->col+=(6
); if (*ctxt->input->cur == 0) xmlParserGrow(ctxt); } while
(0);
5567 if (SKIP_BLANKSxmlSkipBlankChars(ctxt) == 0) {
5568 xmlFatalErrMsg(ctxt, XML_ERR_SPACE_REQUIRED,
5569 "Space required after '<!ENTITY'\n");
5570 }
5571
5572 if (RAW(*ctxt->input->cur) == '%') {
5573 NEXTxmlNextChar(ctxt);
5574 if (SKIP_BLANKSxmlSkipBlankChars(ctxt) == 0) {
5575 xmlFatalErrMsg(ctxt, XML_ERR_SPACE_REQUIRED,
5576 "Space required after '%%'\n");
5577 }
5578 isParameter = 1;
5579 }
5580
5581 name = xmlParseName(ctxt);
5582 if (name == NULL((void*)0)) {
5583 xmlFatalErrMsg(ctxt, XML_ERR_NAME_REQUIRED,
5584 "xmlParseEntityDecl: no name\n");
5585 return;
5586 }
5587 if (xmlStrchr(name, ':') != NULL((void*)0)) {
5588 xmlNsErr(ctxt, XML_NS_ERR_COLON,
5589 "colons are forbidden from entities names '%s'\n",
5590 name, NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0));
5591 }
5592 if (SKIP_BLANKSxmlSkipBlankChars(ctxt) == 0) {
5593 xmlFatalErrMsg(ctxt, XML_ERR_SPACE_REQUIRED,
5594 "Space required after the entity name\n");
5595 }
5596
5597 ctxt->instate = XML_PARSER_ENTITY_DECL;
5598 /*
5599 * handle the various case of definitions...
5600 */
5601 if (isParameter) {
5602 if ((RAW(*ctxt->input->cur) == '"') || (RAW(*ctxt->input->cur) == '\'')) {
5603 value = xmlParseEntityValue(ctxt, &orig);
5604 if (value) {
5605 if ((ctxt->sax != NULL((void*)0)) &&
5606 (!ctxt->disableSAX) && (ctxt->sax->entityDecl != NULL((void*)0)))
5607 ctxt->sax->entityDecl(ctxt->userData, name,
5608 XML_INTERNAL_PARAMETER_ENTITY,
5609 NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0), value);
5610 }
5611 } else {
5612 URI = xmlParseExternalID(ctxt, &literal, 1);
5613 if ((URI == NULL((void*)0)) && (literal == NULL((void*)0))) {
5614 xmlFatalErr(ctxt, XML_ERR_VALUE_REQUIRED, NULL((void*)0));
5615 }
5616 if (URI) {
5617 xmlURIPtr uri;
5618
5619 uri = xmlParseURI((const char *) URI);
5620 if (uri == NULL((void*)0)) {
5621 xmlErrMsgStr(ctxt, XML_ERR_INVALID_URI,
5622 "Invalid URI: %s\n", URI);
5623 /*
5624 * This really ought to be a well formedness error
5625 * but the XML Core WG decided otherwise c.f. issue
5626 * E26 of the XML erratas.
5627 */
5628 } else {
5629 if (uri->fragment != NULL((void*)0)) {
5630 /*
5631 * Okay this is foolish to block those but not
5632 * invalid URIs.
5633 */
5634 xmlFatalErr(ctxt, XML_ERR_URI_FRAGMENT, NULL((void*)0));
5635 } else {
5636 if ((ctxt->sax != NULL((void*)0)) &&
5637 (!ctxt->disableSAX) &&
5638 (ctxt->sax->entityDecl != NULL((void*)0)))
5639 ctxt->sax->entityDecl(ctxt->userData, name,
5640 XML_EXTERNAL_PARAMETER_ENTITY,
5641 literal, URI, NULL((void*)0));
5642 }
5643 xmlFreeURI(uri);
5644 }
5645 }
5646 }
5647 } else {
5648 if ((RAW(*ctxt->input->cur) == '"') || (RAW(*ctxt->input->cur) == '\'')) {
5649 value = xmlParseEntityValue(ctxt, &orig);
5650 if ((ctxt->sax != NULL((void*)0)) &&
5651 (!ctxt->disableSAX) && (ctxt->sax->entityDecl != NULL((void*)0)))
5652 ctxt->sax->entityDecl(ctxt->userData, name,
5653 XML_INTERNAL_GENERAL_ENTITY,
5654 NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0), value);
5655 /*
5656 * For expat compatibility in SAX mode.
5657 */
5658 if ((ctxt->myDoc == NULL((void*)0)) ||
5659 (xmlStrEqual(ctxt->myDoc->version, SAX_COMPAT_MODE(xmlChar *) "SAX compatibility mode document"))) {
5660 if (ctxt->myDoc == NULL((void*)0)) {
5661 ctxt->myDoc = xmlNewDoc(SAX_COMPAT_MODE(xmlChar *) "SAX compatibility mode document");
5662 if (ctxt->myDoc == NULL((void*)0)) {
5663 xmlErrMemory(ctxt, "New Doc failed");
5664 goto done;
5665 }
5666 ctxt->myDoc->properties = XML_DOC_INTERNAL;
5667 }
5668 if (ctxt->myDoc->intSubset == NULL((void*)0))
5669 ctxt->myDoc->intSubset = xmlNewDtd(ctxt->myDoc,
5670 BAD_CAST(xmlChar *) "fake", NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0));
5671
5672 xmlSAX2EntityDecl(ctxt, name, XML_INTERNAL_GENERAL_ENTITY,
5673 NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0), value);
5674 }
5675 } else {
5676 URI = xmlParseExternalID(ctxt, &literal, 1);
5677 if ((URI == NULL((void*)0)) && (literal == NULL((void*)0))) {
5678 xmlFatalErr(ctxt, XML_ERR_VALUE_REQUIRED, NULL((void*)0));
5679 }
5680 if (URI) {
5681 xmlURIPtr uri;
5682
5683 uri = xmlParseURI((const char *)URI);
5684 if (uri == NULL((void*)0)) {
5685 xmlErrMsgStr(ctxt, XML_ERR_INVALID_URI,
5686 "Invalid URI: %s\n", URI);
5687 /*
5688 * This really ought to be a well formedness error
5689 * but the XML Core WG decided otherwise c.f. issue
5690 * E26 of the XML erratas.
5691 */
5692 } else {
5693 if (uri->fragment != NULL((void*)0)) {
5694 /*
5695 * Okay this is foolish to block those but not
5696 * invalid URIs.
5697 */
5698 xmlFatalErr(ctxt, XML_ERR_URI_FRAGMENT, NULL((void*)0));
5699 }
5700 xmlFreeURI(uri);
5701 }
5702 }
5703 if ((RAW(*ctxt->input->cur) != '>') && (SKIP_BLANKSxmlSkipBlankChars(ctxt) == 0)) {
5704 xmlFatalErrMsg(ctxt, XML_ERR_SPACE_REQUIRED,
5705 "Space required before 'NDATA'\n");
5706 }
5707 if (CMP5(CUR_PTR, 'N', 'D', 'A', 'T', 'A')( ( ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 0 ] == 'N' &&
((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 1 ] == 'D' &&
((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 2 ] == 'A' &&
((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 3 ] == 'T' ) &&
((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 4 ] == 'A' )) {
5708 SKIP(5)do { ctxt->input->cur += (5),ctxt->input->col+=(5
); if (*ctxt->input->cur == 0) xmlParserGrow(ctxt); } while
(0);
5709 if (SKIP_BLANKSxmlSkipBlankChars(ctxt) == 0) {
5710 xmlFatalErrMsg(ctxt, XML_ERR_SPACE_REQUIRED,
5711 "Space required after 'NDATA'\n");
5712 }
5713 ndata = xmlParseName(ctxt);
5714 if ((ctxt->sax != NULL((void*)0)) && (!ctxt->disableSAX) &&
5715 (ctxt->sax->unparsedEntityDecl != NULL((void*)0)))
5716 ctxt->sax->unparsedEntityDecl(ctxt->userData, name,
5717 literal, URI, ndata);
5718 } else {
5719 if ((ctxt->sax != NULL((void*)0)) &&
5720 (!ctxt->disableSAX) && (ctxt->sax->entityDecl != NULL((void*)0)))
5721 ctxt->sax->entityDecl(ctxt->userData, name,
5722 XML_EXTERNAL_GENERAL_PARSED_ENTITY,
5723 literal, URI, NULL((void*)0));
5724 /*
5725 * For expat compatibility in SAX mode.
5726 * assuming the entity replacement was asked for
5727 */
5728 if ((ctxt->replaceEntities != 0) &&
5729 ((ctxt->myDoc == NULL((void*)0)) ||
5730 (xmlStrEqual(ctxt->myDoc->version, SAX_COMPAT_MODE(xmlChar *) "SAX compatibility mode document")))) {
5731 if (ctxt->myDoc == NULL((void*)0)) {
5732 ctxt->myDoc = xmlNewDoc(SAX_COMPAT_MODE(xmlChar *) "SAX compatibility mode document");
5733 if (ctxt->myDoc == NULL((void*)0)) {
5734 xmlErrMemory(ctxt, "New Doc failed");
5735 goto done;
5736 }
5737 ctxt->myDoc->properties = XML_DOC_INTERNAL;
5738 }
5739
5740 if (ctxt->myDoc->intSubset == NULL((void*)0))
5741 ctxt->myDoc->intSubset = xmlNewDtd(ctxt->myDoc,
5742 BAD_CAST(xmlChar *) "fake", NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0));
5743 xmlSAX2EntityDecl(ctxt, name,
5744 XML_EXTERNAL_GENERAL_PARSED_ENTITY,
5745 literal, URI, NULL((void*)0));
5746 }
5747 }
5748 }
5749 }
5750 if (ctxt->instate == XML_PARSER_EOF)
5751 goto done;
5752 SKIP_BLANKSxmlSkipBlankChars(ctxt);
5753 if (RAW(*ctxt->input->cur) != '>') {
5754 xmlFatalErrMsgStr(ctxt, XML_ERR_ENTITY_NOT_FINISHED,
5755 "xmlParseEntityDecl: entity %s not terminated\n", name);
5756 xmlHaltParser(ctxt);
5757 } else {
5758 if (inputid != ctxt->input->id) {
5759 xmlFatalErrMsg(ctxt, XML_ERR_ENTITY_BOUNDARY,
5760 "Entity declaration doesn't start and stop in"
5761 " the same entity\n");
5762 }
5763 NEXTxmlNextChar(ctxt);
5764 }
5765 if (orig != NULL((void*)0)) {
5766 /*
5767 * Ugly mechanism to save the raw entity value.
5768 */
5769 xmlEntityPtr cur = NULL((void*)0);
5770
5771 if (isParameter) {
5772 if ((ctxt->sax != NULL((void*)0)) &&
5773 (ctxt->sax->getParameterEntity != NULL((void*)0)))
5774 cur = ctxt->sax->getParameterEntity(ctxt->userData, name);
5775 } else {
5776 if ((ctxt->sax != NULL((void*)0)) &&
5777 (ctxt->sax->getEntity != NULL((void*)0)))
5778 cur = ctxt->sax->getEntity(ctxt->userData, name);
5779 if ((cur == NULL((void*)0)) && (ctxt->userData==ctxt)) {
5780 cur = xmlSAX2GetEntity(ctxt, name);
5781 }
5782 }
5783 if ((cur != NULL((void*)0)) && (cur->orig == NULL((void*)0))) {
5784 cur->orig = orig;
5785 orig = NULL((void*)0);
5786 }
5787 }
5788
5789done:
5790 if (value != NULL((void*)0)) xmlFree(value);
5791 if (URI != NULL((void*)0)) xmlFree(URI);
5792 if (literal != NULL((void*)0)) xmlFree(literal);
5793 if (orig != NULL((void*)0)) xmlFree(orig);
5794 }
5795}
5796
5797/**
5798 * xmlParseDefaultDecl:
5799 * @ctxt: an XML parser context
5800 * @value: Receive a possible fixed default value for the attribute
5801 *
5802 * DEPRECATED: Internal function, don't use.
5803 *
5804 * Parse an attribute default declaration
5805 *
5806 * [60] DefaultDecl ::= '#REQUIRED' | '#IMPLIED' | (('#FIXED' S)? AttValue)
5807 *
5808 * [ VC: Required Attribute ]
5809 * if the default declaration is the keyword #REQUIRED, then the
5810 * attribute must be specified for all elements of the type in the
5811 * attribute-list declaration.
5812 *
5813 * [ VC: Attribute Default Legal ]
5814 * The declared default value must meet the lexical constraints of
5815 * the declared attribute type c.f. xmlValidateAttributeDecl()
5816 *
5817 * [ VC: Fixed Attribute Default ]
5818 * if an attribute has a default value declared with the #FIXED
5819 * keyword, instances of that attribute must match the default value.
5820 *
5821 * [ WFC: No < in Attribute Values ]
5822 * handled in xmlParseAttValue()
5823 *
5824 * returns: XML_ATTRIBUTE_NONE, XML_ATTRIBUTE_REQUIRED, XML_ATTRIBUTE_IMPLIED
5825 * or XML_ATTRIBUTE_FIXED.
5826 */
5827
5828int
5829xmlParseDefaultDecl(xmlParserCtxtPtr ctxt, xmlChar **value) {
5830 int val;
5831 xmlChar *ret;
5832
5833 *value = NULL((void*)0);
5834 if (CMP9(CUR_PTR, '#', 'R', 'E', 'Q', 'U', 'I', 'R', 'E', 'D')( ( ( ( ( ( ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 0 ] ==
'#' && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 1
] == 'R' && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur
)[ 2 ] == 'E' && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->
cur)[ 3 ] == 'Q' ) && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input
->cur)[ 4 ] == 'U' ) && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->
input->cur)[ 5 ] == 'I' ) && ((unsigned char *) ctxt
->input->cur)[ 6 ] == 'R' ) && ((unsigned char *
) ctxt->input->cur)[ 7 ] == 'E' ) && ((unsigned
char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 8 ] == 'D' )) {
5835 SKIP(9)do { ctxt->input->cur += (9),ctxt->input->col+=(9
); if (*ctxt->input->cur == 0) xmlParserGrow(ctxt); } while
(0);
5836 return(XML_ATTRIBUTE_REQUIRED);
5837 }
5838 if (CMP8(CUR_PTR, '#', 'I', 'M', 'P', 'L', 'I', 'E', 'D')( ( ( ( ( ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 0 ] == '#'
&& ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 1 ] ==
'I' && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 2
] == 'M' && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur
)[ 3 ] == 'P' ) && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->
cur)[ 4 ] == 'L' ) && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input
->cur)[ 5 ] == 'I' ) && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->
input->cur)[ 6 ] == 'E' ) && ((unsigned char *) ctxt
->input->cur)[ 7 ] == 'D' )) {
5839 SKIP(8)do { ctxt->input->cur += (8),ctxt->input->col+=(8
); if (*ctxt->input->cur == 0) xmlParserGrow(ctxt); } while
(0);
5840 return(XML_ATTRIBUTE_IMPLIED);
5841 }
5842 val = XML_ATTRIBUTE_NONE;
5843 if (CMP6(CUR_PTR, '#', 'F', 'I', 'X', 'E', 'D')( ( ( ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 0 ] == '#' &&
((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 1 ] == 'F' &&
((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 2 ] == 'I' &&
((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 3 ] == 'X' ) &&
((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 4 ] == 'E' ) &&
((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 5 ] == 'D' )) {
5844 SKIP(6)do { ctxt->input->cur += (6),ctxt->input->col+=(6
); if (*ctxt->input->cur == 0) xmlParserGrow(ctxt); } while
(0);
5845 val = XML_ATTRIBUTE_FIXED;
5846 if (SKIP_BLANKSxmlSkipBlankChars(ctxt) == 0) {
5847 xmlFatalErrMsg(ctxt, XML_ERR_SPACE_REQUIRED,
5848 "Space required after '#FIXED'\n");
5849 }
5850 }
5851 ret = xmlParseAttValue(ctxt);
5852 ctxt->instate = XML_PARSER_DTD;
5853 if (ret == NULL((void*)0)) {
5854 xmlFatalErrMsg(ctxt, (xmlParserErrors)ctxt->errNo,
5855 "Attribute default value declaration error\n");
5856 } else
5857 *value = ret;
5858 return(val);
5859}
5860
5861/**
5862 * xmlParseNotationType:
5863 * @ctxt: an XML parser context
5864 *
5865 * DEPRECATED: Internal function, don't use.
5866 *
5867 * parse an Notation attribute type.
5868 *
5869 * Note: the leading 'NOTATION' S part has already being parsed...
5870 *
5871 * [58] NotationType ::= 'NOTATION' S '(' S? Name (S? '|' S? Name)* S? ')'
5872 *
5873 * [ VC: Notation Attributes ]
5874 * Values of this type must match one of the notation names included
5875 * in the declaration; all notation names in the declaration must be declared.
5876 *
5877 * Returns: the notation attribute tree built while parsing
5878 */
5879
5880xmlEnumerationPtr
5881xmlParseNotationType(xmlParserCtxtPtr ctxt) {
5882 const xmlChar *name;
5883 xmlEnumerationPtr ret = NULL((void*)0), last = NULL((void*)0), cur, tmp;
5884
5885 if (RAW(*ctxt->input->cur) != '(') {
5886 xmlFatalErr(ctxt, XML_ERR_NOTATION_NOT_STARTED, NULL((void*)0));
5887 return(NULL((void*)0));
5888 }
5889 do {
5890 NEXTxmlNextChar(ctxt);
5891 SKIP_BLANKSxmlSkipBlankChars(ctxt);
5892 name = xmlParseName(ctxt);
5893 if (name == NULL((void*)0)) {
5894 xmlFatalErrMsg(ctxt, XML_ERR_NAME_REQUIRED,
5895 "Name expected in NOTATION declaration\n");
5896 xmlFreeEnumeration(ret);
5897 return(NULL((void*)0));
5898 }
5899 tmp = ret;
5900 while (tmp != NULL((void*)0)) {
5901 if (xmlStrEqual(name, tmp->name)) {
5902 xmlValidityError(ctxt, XML_DTD_DUP_TOKEN,
5903 "standalone: attribute notation value token %s duplicated\n",
5904 name, NULL((void*)0));
5905 if (!xmlDictOwns(ctxt->dict, name))
5906 xmlFree((xmlChar *) name);
5907 break;
5908 }
5909 tmp = tmp->next;
5910 }
5911 if (tmp == NULL((void*)0)) {
5912 cur = xmlCreateEnumeration(name);
5913 if (cur == NULL((void*)0)) {
5914 xmlFreeEnumeration(ret);
5915 return(NULL((void*)0));
5916 }
5917 if (last == NULL((void*)0)) ret = last = cur;
5918 else {
5919 last->next = cur;
5920 last = cur;
5921 }
5922 }
5923 SKIP_BLANKSxmlSkipBlankChars(ctxt);
5924 } while (RAW(*ctxt->input->cur) == '|');
5925 if (RAW(*ctxt->input->cur) != ')') {
5926 xmlFatalErr(ctxt, XML_ERR_NOTATION_NOT_FINISHED, NULL((void*)0));
5927 xmlFreeEnumeration(ret);
5928 return(NULL((void*)0));
5929 }
5930 NEXTxmlNextChar(ctxt);
5931 return(ret);
5932}
5933
5934/**
5935 * xmlParseEnumerationType:
5936 * @ctxt: an XML parser context
5937 *
5938 * DEPRECATED: Internal function, don't use.
5939 *
5940 * parse an Enumeration attribute type.
5941 *
5942 * [59] Enumeration ::= '(' S? Nmtoken (S? '|' S? Nmtoken)* S? ')'
5943 *
5944 * [ VC: Enumeration ]
5945 * Values of this type must match one of the Nmtoken tokens in
5946 * the declaration
5947 *
5948 * Returns: the enumeration attribute tree built while parsing
5949 */
5950
5951xmlEnumerationPtr
5952xmlParseEnumerationType(xmlParserCtxtPtr ctxt) {
5953 xmlChar *name;
5954 xmlEnumerationPtr ret = NULL((void*)0), last = NULL((void*)0), cur, tmp;
5955
5956 if (RAW(*ctxt->input->cur) != '(') {
5957 xmlFatalErr(ctxt, XML_ERR_ATTLIST_NOT_STARTED, NULL((void*)0));
5958 return(NULL((void*)0));
5959 }
5960 do {
5961 NEXTxmlNextChar(ctxt);
5962 SKIP_BLANKSxmlSkipBlankChars(ctxt);
5963 name = xmlParseNmtoken(ctxt);
5964 if (name == NULL((void*)0)) {
5965 xmlFatalErr(ctxt, XML_ERR_NMTOKEN_REQUIRED, NULL((void*)0));
5966 return(ret);
5967 }
5968 tmp = ret;
5969 while (tmp != NULL((void*)0)) {
5970 if (xmlStrEqual(name, tmp->name)) {
5971 xmlValidityError(ctxt, XML_DTD_DUP_TOKEN,
5972 "standalone: attribute enumeration value token %s duplicated\n",
5973 name, NULL((void*)0));
5974 if (!xmlDictOwns(ctxt->dict, name))
5975 xmlFree(name);
5976 break;
5977 }
5978 tmp = tmp->next;
5979 }
5980 if (tmp == NULL((void*)0)) {
5981 cur = xmlCreateEnumeration(name);
5982 if (!xmlDictOwns(ctxt->dict, name))
5983 xmlFree(name);
5984 if (cur == NULL((void*)0)) {
5985 xmlFreeEnumeration(ret);
5986 return(NULL((void*)0));
5987 }
5988 if (last == NULL((void*)0)) ret = last = cur;
5989 else {
5990 last->next = cur;
5991 last = cur;
5992 }
5993 }
5994 SKIP_BLANKSxmlSkipBlankChars(ctxt);
5995 } while (RAW(*ctxt->input->cur) == '|');
5996 if (RAW(*ctxt->input->cur) != ')') {
5997 xmlFatalErr(ctxt, XML_ERR_ATTLIST_NOT_FINISHED, NULL((void*)0));
5998 return(ret);
5999 }
6000 NEXTxmlNextChar(ctxt);
6001 return(ret);
6002}
6003
6004/**
6005 * xmlParseEnumeratedType:
6006 * @ctxt: an XML parser context
6007 * @tree: the enumeration tree built while parsing
6008 *
6009 * DEPRECATED: Internal function, don't use.
6010 *
6011 * parse an Enumerated attribute type.
6012 *
6013 * [57] EnumeratedType ::= NotationType | Enumeration
6014 *
6015 * [58] NotationType ::= 'NOTATION' S '(' S? Name (S? '|' S? Name)* S? ')'
6016 *
6017 *
6018 * Returns: XML_ATTRIBUTE_ENUMERATION or XML_ATTRIBUTE_NOTATION
6019 */
6020
6021int
6022xmlParseEnumeratedType(xmlParserCtxtPtr ctxt, xmlEnumerationPtr *tree) {
6023 if (CMP8(CUR_PTR, 'N', 'O', 'T', 'A', 'T', 'I', 'O', 'N')( ( ( ( ( ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 0 ] == 'N'
&& ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 1 ] ==
'O' && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 2
] == 'T' && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur
)[ 3 ] == 'A' ) && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->
cur)[ 4 ] == 'T' ) && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input
->cur)[ 5 ] == 'I' ) && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->
input->cur)[ 6 ] == 'O' ) && ((unsigned char *) ctxt
->input->cur)[ 7 ] == 'N' )) {
6024 SKIP(8)do { ctxt->input->cur += (8),ctxt->input->col+=(8
); if (*ctxt->input->cur == 0) xmlParserGrow(ctxt); } while
(0);
6025 if (SKIP_BLANKSxmlSkipBlankChars(ctxt) == 0) {
6026 xmlFatalErrMsg(ctxt, XML_ERR_SPACE_REQUIRED,
6027 "Space required after 'NOTATION'\n");
6028 return(0);
6029 }
6030 *tree = xmlParseNotationType(ctxt);
6031 if (*tree == NULL((void*)0)) return(0);
6032 return(XML_ATTRIBUTE_NOTATION);
6033 }
6034 *tree = xmlParseEnumerationType(ctxt);
6035 if (*tree == NULL((void*)0)) return(0);
6036 return(XML_ATTRIBUTE_ENUMERATION);
6037}
6038
6039/**
6040 * xmlParseAttributeType:
6041 * @ctxt: an XML parser context
6042 * @tree: the enumeration tree built while parsing
6043 *
6044 * DEPRECATED: Internal function, don't use.
6045 *
6046 * parse the Attribute list def for an element
6047 *
6048 * [54] AttType ::= StringType | TokenizedType | EnumeratedType
6049 *
6050 * [55] StringType ::= 'CDATA'
6051 *
6052 * [56] TokenizedType ::= 'ID' | 'IDREF' | 'IDREFS' | 'ENTITY' |
6053 * 'ENTITIES' | 'NMTOKEN' | 'NMTOKENS'
6054 *
6055 * Validity constraints for attribute values syntax are checked in
6056 * xmlValidateAttributeValue()
6057 *
6058 * [ VC: ID ]
6059 * Values of type ID must match the Name production. A name must not
6060 * appear more than once in an XML document as a value of this type;
6061 * i.e., ID values must uniquely identify the elements which bear them.
6062 *
6063 * [ VC: One ID per Element Type ]
6064 * No element type may have more than one ID attribute specified.
6065 *
6066 * [ VC: ID Attribute Default ]
6067 * An ID attribute must have a declared default of #IMPLIED or #REQUIRED.
6068 *
6069 * [ VC: IDREF ]
6070 * Values of type IDREF must match the Name production, and values
6071 * of type IDREFS must match Names; each IDREF Name must match the value
6072 * of an ID attribute on some element in the XML document; i.e. IDREF
6073 * values must match the value of some ID attribute.
6074 *
6075 * [ VC: Entity Name ]
6076 * Values of type ENTITY must match the Name production, values
6077 * of type ENTITIES must match Names; each Entity Name must match the
6078 * name of an unparsed entity declared in the DTD.
6079 *
6080 * [ VC: Name Token ]
6081 * Values of type NMTOKEN must match the Nmtoken production; values
6082 * of type NMTOKENS must match Nmtokens.
6083 *
6084 * Returns the attribute type
6085 */
6086int
6087xmlParseAttributeType(xmlParserCtxtPtr ctxt, xmlEnumerationPtr *tree) {
6088 if (CMP5(CUR_PTR, 'C', 'D', 'A', 'T', 'A')( ( ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 0 ] == 'C' &&
((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 1 ] == 'D' &&
((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 2 ] == 'A' &&
((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 3 ] == 'T' ) &&
((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 4 ] == 'A' )) {
6089 SKIP(5)do { ctxt->input->cur += (5),ctxt->input->col+=(5
); if (*ctxt->input->cur == 0) xmlParserGrow(ctxt); } while
(0);
6090 return(XML_ATTRIBUTE_CDATA);
6091 } else if (CMP6(CUR_PTR, 'I', 'D', 'R', 'E', 'F', 'S')( ( ( ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 0 ] == 'I' &&
((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 1 ] == 'D' &&
((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 2 ] == 'R' &&
((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 3 ] == 'E' ) &&
((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 4 ] == 'F' ) &&
((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 5 ] == 'S' )) {
6092 SKIP(6)do { ctxt->input->cur += (6),ctxt->input->col+=(6
); if (*ctxt->input->cur == 0) xmlParserGrow(ctxt); } while
(0);
6093 return(XML_ATTRIBUTE_IDREFS);
6094 } else if (CMP5(CUR_PTR, 'I', 'D', 'R', 'E', 'F')( ( ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 0 ] == 'I' &&
((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 1 ] == 'D' &&
((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 2 ] == 'R' &&
((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 3 ] == 'E' ) &&
((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 4 ] == 'F' )) {
6095 SKIP(5)do { ctxt->input->cur += (5),ctxt->input->col+=(5
); if (*ctxt->input->cur == 0) xmlParserGrow(ctxt); } while
(0);
6096 return(XML_ATTRIBUTE_IDREF);
6097 } else if ((RAW(*ctxt->input->cur) == 'I') && (NXT(1)ctxt->input->cur[(1)] == 'D')) {
6098 SKIP(2)do { ctxt->input->cur += (2),ctxt->input->col+=(2
); if (*ctxt->input->cur == 0) xmlParserGrow(ctxt); } while
(0);
6099 return(XML_ATTRIBUTE_ID);
6100 } else if (CMP6(CUR_PTR, 'E', 'N', 'T', 'I', 'T', 'Y')( ( ( ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 0 ] == 'E' &&
((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 1 ] == 'N' &&
((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 2 ] == 'T' &&
((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 3 ] == 'I' ) &&
((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 4 ] == 'T' ) &&
((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 5 ] == 'Y' )) {
6101 SKIP(6)do { ctxt->input->cur += (6),ctxt->input->col+=(6
); if (*ctxt->input->cur == 0) xmlParserGrow(ctxt); } while
(0);
6102 return(XML_ATTRIBUTE_ENTITY);
6103 } else if (CMP8(CUR_PTR, 'E', 'N', 'T', 'I', 'T', 'I', 'E', 'S')( ( ( ( ( ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 0 ] == 'E'
&& ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 1 ] ==
'N' && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 2
] == 'T' && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur
)[ 3 ] == 'I' ) && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->
cur)[ 4 ] == 'T' ) && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input
->cur)[ 5 ] == 'I' ) && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->
input->cur)[ 6 ] == 'E' ) && ((unsigned char *) ctxt
->input->cur)[ 7 ] == 'S' )) {
6104 SKIP(8)do { ctxt->input->cur += (8),ctxt->input->col+=(8
); if (*ctxt->input->cur == 0) xmlParserGrow(ctxt); } while
(0);
6105 return(XML_ATTRIBUTE_ENTITIES);
6106 } else if (CMP8(CUR_PTR, 'N', 'M', 'T', 'O', 'K', 'E', 'N', 'S')( ( ( ( ( ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 0 ] == 'N'
&& ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 1 ] ==
'M' && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 2
] == 'T' && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur
)[ 3 ] == 'O' ) && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->
cur)[ 4 ] == 'K' ) && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input
->cur)[ 5 ] == 'E' ) && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->
input->cur)[ 6 ] == 'N' ) && ((unsigned char *) ctxt
->input->cur)[ 7 ] == 'S' )) {
6107 SKIP(8)do { ctxt->input->cur += (8),ctxt->input->col+=(8
); if (*ctxt->input->cur == 0) xmlParserGrow(ctxt); } while
(0);
6108 return(XML_ATTRIBUTE_NMTOKENS);
6109 } else if (CMP7(CUR_PTR, 'N', 'M', 'T', 'O', 'K', 'E', 'N')( ( ( ( ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 0 ] == 'N'
&& ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 1 ] ==
'M' && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 2
] == 'T' && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur
)[ 3 ] == 'O' ) && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->
cur)[ 4 ] == 'K' ) && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input
->cur)[ 5 ] == 'E' ) && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->
input->cur)[ 6 ] == 'N' )) {
6110 SKIP(7)do { ctxt->input->cur += (7),ctxt->input->col+=(7
); if (*ctxt->input->cur == 0) xmlParserGrow(ctxt); } while
(0);
6111 return(XML_ATTRIBUTE_NMTOKEN);
6112 }
6113 return(xmlParseEnumeratedType(ctxt, tree));
6114}
6115
6116/**
6117 * xmlParseAttributeListDecl:
6118 * @ctxt: an XML parser context
6119 *
6120 * DEPRECATED: Internal function, don't use.
6121 *
6122 * Parse an attribute list declaration for an element. Always consumes '<!'.
6123 *
6124 * [52] AttlistDecl ::= '<!ATTLIST' S Name AttDef* S? '>'
6125 *
6126 * [53] AttDef ::= S Name S AttType S DefaultDecl
6127 *
6128 */
6129void
6130xmlParseAttributeListDecl(xmlParserCtxtPtr ctxt) {
6131 const xmlChar *elemName;
6132 const xmlChar *attrName;
6133 xmlEnumerationPtr tree;
6134
6135 if ((CUR(*ctxt->input->cur) != '<') || (NXT(1)ctxt->input->cur[(1)] != '!'))
6136 return;
6137 SKIP(2)do { ctxt->input->cur += (2),ctxt->input->col+=(2
); if (*ctxt->input->cur == 0) xmlParserGrow(ctxt); } while
(0);
6138
6139 if (CMP7(CUR_PTR, 'A', 'T', 'T', 'L', 'I', 'S', 'T')( ( ( ( ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 0 ] == 'A'
&& ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 1 ] ==
'T' && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 2
] == 'T' && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur
)[ 3 ] == 'L' ) && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->
cur)[ 4 ] == 'I' ) && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input
->cur)[ 5 ] == 'S' ) && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->
input->cur)[ 6 ] == 'T' )) {
6140 int inputid = ctxt->input->id;
6141
6142 SKIP(7)do { ctxt->input->cur += (7),ctxt->input->col+=(7
); if (*ctxt->input->cur == 0) xmlParserGrow(ctxt); } while
(0);
6143 if (SKIP_BLANKSxmlSkipBlankChars(ctxt) == 0) {
6144 xmlFatalErrMsg(ctxt, XML_ERR_SPACE_REQUIRED,
6145 "Space required after '<!ATTLIST'\n");
6146 }
6147 elemName = xmlParseName(ctxt);
6148 if (elemName == NULL((void*)0)) {
6149 xmlFatalErrMsg(ctxt, XML_ERR_NAME_REQUIRED,
6150 "ATTLIST: no name for Element\n");
6151 return;
6152 }
6153 SKIP_BLANKSxmlSkipBlankChars(ctxt);
6154 GROWif (ctxt->input->end - ctxt->input->cur < 250)
xmlParserGrow(ctxt);;
6155 while ((RAW(*ctxt->input->cur) != '>') && (ctxt->instate != XML_PARSER_EOF)) {
6156 int type;
6157 int def;
6158 xmlChar *defaultValue = NULL((void*)0);
6159
6160 GROWif (ctxt->input->end - ctxt->input->cur < 250)
xmlParserGrow(ctxt);;
6161 tree = NULL((void*)0);
6162 attrName = xmlParseName(ctxt);
6163 if (attrName == NULL((void*)0)) {
6164 xmlFatalErrMsg(ctxt, XML_ERR_NAME_REQUIRED,
6165 "ATTLIST: no name for Attribute\n");
6166 break;
6167 }
6168 GROWif (ctxt->input->end - ctxt->input->cur < 250)
xmlParserGrow(ctxt);;
6169 if (SKIP_BLANKSxmlSkipBlankChars(ctxt) == 0) {
6170 xmlFatalErrMsg(ctxt, XML_ERR_SPACE_REQUIRED,
6171 "Space required after the attribute name\n");
6172 break;
6173 }
6174
6175 type = xmlParseAttributeType(ctxt, &tree);
6176 if (type <= 0) {
6177 break;
6178 }
6179
6180 GROWif (ctxt->input->end - ctxt->input->cur < 250)
xmlParserGrow(ctxt);;
6181 if (SKIP_BLANKSxmlSkipBlankChars(ctxt) == 0) {
6182 xmlFatalErrMsg(ctxt, XML_ERR_SPACE_REQUIRED,
6183 "Space required after the attribute type\n");
6184 if (tree != NULL((void*)0))
6185 xmlFreeEnumeration(tree);
6186 break;
6187 }
6188
6189 def = xmlParseDefaultDecl(ctxt, &defaultValue);
6190 if (def <= 0) {
6191 if (defaultValue != NULL((void*)0))
6192 xmlFree(defaultValue);
6193 if (tree != NULL((void*)0))
6194 xmlFreeEnumeration(tree);
6195 break;
6196 }
6197 if ((type != XML_ATTRIBUTE_CDATA) && (defaultValue != NULL((void*)0)))
6198 xmlAttrNormalizeSpace(defaultValue, defaultValue);
6199
6200 GROWif (ctxt->input->end - ctxt->input->cur < 250)
xmlParserGrow(ctxt);;
6201 if (RAW(*ctxt->input->cur) != '>') {
6202 if (SKIP_BLANKSxmlSkipBlankChars(ctxt) == 0) {
6203 xmlFatalErrMsg(ctxt, XML_ERR_SPACE_REQUIRED,
6204 "Space required after the attribute default value\n");
6205 if (defaultValue != NULL((void*)0))
6206 xmlFree(defaultValue);
6207 if (tree != NULL((void*)0))
6208 xmlFreeEnumeration(tree);
6209 break;
6210 }
6211 }
6212 if ((ctxt->sax != NULL((void*)0)) && (!ctxt->disableSAX) &&
6213 (ctxt->sax->attributeDecl != NULL((void*)0)))
6214 ctxt->sax->attributeDecl(ctxt->userData, elemName, attrName,
6215 type, def, defaultValue, tree);
6216 else if (tree != NULL((void*)0))
6217 xmlFreeEnumeration(tree);
6218
6219 if ((ctxt->sax2) && (defaultValue != NULL((void*)0)) &&
6220 (def != XML_ATTRIBUTE_IMPLIED) &&
6221 (def != XML_ATTRIBUTE_REQUIRED)) {
6222 xmlAddDefAttrs(ctxt, elemName, attrName, defaultValue);
6223 }
6224 if (ctxt->sax2) {
6225 xmlAddSpecialAttr(ctxt, elemName, attrName, type);
6226 }
6227 if (defaultValue != NULL((void*)0))
6228 xmlFree(defaultValue);
6229 GROWif (ctxt->input->end - ctxt->input->cur < 250)
xmlParserGrow(ctxt);;
6230 }
6231 if (RAW(*ctxt->input->cur) == '>') {
6232 if (inputid != ctxt->input->id) {
6233 xmlFatalErrMsg(ctxt, XML_ERR_ENTITY_BOUNDARY,
6234 "Attribute list declaration doesn't start and"
6235 " stop in the same entity\n");
6236 }
6237 NEXTxmlNextChar(ctxt);
6238 }
6239 }
6240}
6241
6242/**
6243 * xmlParseElementMixedContentDecl:
6244 * @ctxt: an XML parser context
6245 * @inputchk: the input used for the current entity, needed for boundary checks
6246 *
6247 * DEPRECATED: Internal function, don't use.
6248 *
6249 * parse the declaration for a Mixed Element content
6250 * The leading '(' and spaces have been skipped in xmlParseElementContentDecl
6251 *
6252 * [51] Mixed ::= '(' S? '#PCDATA' (S? '|' S? Name)* S? ')*' |
6253 * '(' S? '#PCDATA' S? ')'
6254 *
6255 * [ VC: Proper Group/PE Nesting ] applies to [51] too (see [49])
6256 *
6257 * [ VC: No Duplicate Types ]
6258 * The same name must not appear more than once in a single
6259 * mixed-content declaration.
6260 *
6261 * returns: the list of the xmlElementContentPtr describing the element choices
6262 */
6263xmlElementContentPtr
6264xmlParseElementMixedContentDecl(xmlParserCtxtPtr ctxt, int inputchk) {
6265 xmlElementContentPtr ret = NULL((void*)0), cur = NULL((void*)0), n;
6266 const xmlChar *elem = NULL((void*)0);
6267
6268 GROWif (ctxt->input->end - ctxt->input->cur < 250)
xmlParserGrow(ctxt);;
6269 if (CMP7(CUR_PTR, '#', 'P', 'C', 'D', 'A', 'T', 'A')( ( ( ( ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 0 ] == '#'
&& ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 1 ] ==
'P' && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 2
] == 'C' && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur
)[ 3 ] == 'D' ) && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->
cur)[ 4 ] == 'A' ) && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input
->cur)[ 5 ] == 'T' ) && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->
input->cur)[ 6 ] == 'A' )) {
6270 SKIP(7)do { ctxt->input->cur += (7),ctxt->input->col+=(7
); if (*ctxt->input->cur == 0) xmlParserGrow(ctxt); } while
(0);
6271 SKIP_BLANKSxmlSkipBlankChars(ctxt);
6272 if (RAW(*ctxt->input->cur) == ')') {
6273 if (ctxt->input->id != inputchk) {
6274 xmlFatalErrMsg(ctxt, XML_ERR_ENTITY_BOUNDARY,
6275 "Element content declaration doesn't start and"
6276 " stop in the same entity\n");
6277 }
6278 NEXTxmlNextChar(ctxt);
6279 ret = xmlNewDocElementContent(ctxt->myDoc, NULL((void*)0), XML_ELEMENT_CONTENT_PCDATA);
6280 if (ret == NULL((void*)0))
6281 return(NULL((void*)0));
6282 if (RAW(*ctxt->input->cur) == '*') {
6283 ret->ocur = XML_ELEMENT_CONTENT_MULT;
6284 NEXTxmlNextChar(ctxt);
6285 }
6286 return(ret);
6287 }
6288 if ((RAW(*ctxt->input->cur) == '(') || (RAW(*ctxt->input->cur) == '|')) {
6289 ret = cur = xmlNewDocElementContent(ctxt->myDoc, NULL((void*)0), XML_ELEMENT_CONTENT_PCDATA);
6290 if (ret == NULL((void*)0)) return(NULL((void*)0));
6291 }
6292 while ((RAW(*ctxt->input->cur) == '|') && (ctxt->instate != XML_PARSER_EOF)) {
6293 NEXTxmlNextChar(ctxt);
6294 if (elem == NULL((void*)0)) {
6295 ret = xmlNewDocElementContent(ctxt->myDoc, NULL((void*)0), XML_ELEMENT_CONTENT_OR);
6296 if (ret == NULL((void*)0)) {
6297 xmlFreeDocElementContent(ctxt->myDoc, cur);
6298 return(NULL((void*)0));
6299 }
6300 ret->c1 = cur;
6301 if (cur != NULL((void*)0))
6302 cur->parent = ret;
6303 cur = ret;
6304 } else {
6305 n = xmlNewDocElementContent(ctxt->myDoc, NULL((void*)0), XML_ELEMENT_CONTENT_OR);
6306 if (n == NULL((void*)0)) {
6307 xmlFreeDocElementContent(ctxt->myDoc, ret);
6308 return(NULL((void*)0));
6309 }
6310 n->c1 = xmlNewDocElementContent(ctxt->myDoc, elem, XML_ELEMENT_CONTENT_ELEMENT);
6311 if (n->c1 != NULL((void*)0))
6312 n->c1->parent = n;
6313 cur->c2 = n;
6314 if (n != NULL((void*)0))
6315 n->parent = cur;
6316 cur = n;
6317 }
6318 SKIP_BLANKSxmlSkipBlankChars(ctxt);
6319 elem = xmlParseName(ctxt);
6320 if (elem == NULL((void*)0)) {
6321 xmlFatalErrMsg(ctxt, XML_ERR_NAME_REQUIRED,
6322 "xmlParseElementMixedContentDecl : Name expected\n");
6323 xmlFreeDocElementContent(ctxt->myDoc, ret);
6324 return(NULL((void*)0));
6325 }
6326 SKIP_BLANKSxmlSkipBlankChars(ctxt);
6327 GROWif (ctxt->input->end - ctxt->input->cur < 250)
xmlParserGrow(ctxt);;
6328 }
6329 if ((RAW(*ctxt->input->cur) == ')') && (NXT(1)ctxt->input->cur[(1)] == '*')) {
6330 if (elem != NULL((void*)0)) {
6331 cur->c2 = xmlNewDocElementContent(ctxt->myDoc, elem,
6332 XML_ELEMENT_CONTENT_ELEMENT);
6333 if (cur->c2 != NULL((void*)0))
6334 cur->c2->parent = cur;
6335 }
6336 if (ret != NULL((void*)0))
6337 ret->ocur = XML_ELEMENT_CONTENT_MULT;
6338 if (ctxt->input->id != inputchk) {
6339 xmlFatalErrMsg(ctxt, XML_ERR_ENTITY_BOUNDARY,
6340 "Element content declaration doesn't start and"
6341 " stop in the same entity\n");
6342 }
6343 SKIP(2)do { ctxt->input->cur += (2),ctxt->input->col+=(2
); if (*ctxt->input->cur == 0) xmlParserGrow(ctxt); } while
(0);
6344 } else {
6345 xmlFreeDocElementContent(ctxt->myDoc, ret);
6346 xmlFatalErr(ctxt, XML_ERR_MIXED_NOT_STARTED, NULL((void*)0));
6347 return(NULL((void*)0));
6348 }
6349
6350 } else {
6351 xmlFatalErr(ctxt, XML_ERR_PCDATA_REQUIRED, NULL((void*)0));
6352 }
6353 return(ret);
6354}
6355
6356/**
6357 * xmlParseElementChildrenContentDeclPriv:
6358 * @ctxt: an XML parser context
6359 * @inputchk: the input used for the current entity, needed for boundary checks
6360 * @depth: the level of recursion
6361 *
6362 * parse the declaration for a Mixed Element content
6363 * The leading '(' and spaces have been skipped in xmlParseElementContentDecl
6364 *
6365 *
6366 * [47] children ::= (choice | seq) ('?' | '*' | '+')?
6367 *
6368 * [48] cp ::= (Name | choice | seq) ('?' | '*' | '+')?
6369 *
6370 * [49] choice ::= '(' S? cp ( S? '|' S? cp )* S? ')'
6371 *
6372 * [50] seq ::= '(' S? cp ( S? ',' S? cp )* S? ')'
6373 *
6374 * [ VC: Proper Group/PE Nesting ] applies to [49] and [50]
6375 * TODO Parameter-entity replacement text must be properly nested
6376 * with parenthesized groups. That is to say, if either of the
6377 * opening or closing parentheses in a choice, seq, or Mixed
6378 * construct is contained in the replacement text for a parameter
6379 * entity, both must be contained in the same replacement text. For
6380 * interoperability, if a parameter-entity reference appears in a
6381 * choice, seq, or Mixed construct, its replacement text should not
6382 * be empty, and neither the first nor last non-blank character of
6383 * the replacement text should be a connector (| or ,).
6384 *
6385 * Returns the tree of xmlElementContentPtr describing the element
6386 * hierarchy.
6387 */
6388static xmlElementContentPtr
6389xmlParseElementChildrenContentDeclPriv(xmlParserCtxtPtr ctxt, int inputchk,
6390 int depth) {
6391 xmlElementContentPtr ret = NULL((void*)0), cur = NULL((void*)0), last = NULL((void*)0), op = NULL((void*)0);
6392 const xmlChar *elem;
6393 xmlChar type = 0;
6394
6395 if (((depth > 128) && ((ctxt->options & XML_PARSE_HUGE) == 0)) ||
6396 (depth > 2048)) {
6397 xmlFatalErrMsgInt(ctxt, XML_ERR_ELEMCONTENT_NOT_FINISHED,
6398"xmlParseElementChildrenContentDecl : depth %d too deep, use XML_PARSE_HUGE\n",
6399 depth);
6400 return(NULL((void*)0));
6401 }
6402 SKIP_BLANKSxmlSkipBlankChars(ctxt);
6403 GROWif (ctxt->input->end - ctxt->input->cur < 250)
xmlParserGrow(ctxt);;
6404 if (RAW(*ctxt->input->cur) == '(') {
6405 int inputid = ctxt->input->id;
6406
6407 /* Recurse on first child */
6408 NEXTxmlNextChar(ctxt);
6409 SKIP_BLANKSxmlSkipBlankChars(ctxt);
6410 cur = ret = xmlParseElementChildrenContentDeclPriv(ctxt, inputid,
6411 depth + 1);
6412 if (cur == NULL((void*)0))
6413 return(NULL((void*)0));
6414 SKIP_BLANKSxmlSkipBlankChars(ctxt);
6415 GROWif (ctxt->input->end - ctxt->input->cur < 250)
xmlParserGrow(ctxt);;
6416 } else {
6417 elem = xmlParseName(ctxt);
6418 if (elem == NULL((void*)0)) {
6419 xmlFatalErr(ctxt, XML_ERR_ELEMCONTENT_NOT_STARTED, NULL((void*)0));
6420 return(NULL((void*)0));
6421 }
6422 cur = ret = xmlNewDocElementContent(ctxt->myDoc, elem, XML_ELEMENT_CONTENT_ELEMENT);
6423 if (cur == NULL((void*)0)) {
6424 xmlErrMemory(ctxt, NULL((void*)0));
6425 return(NULL((void*)0));
6426 }
6427 GROWif (ctxt->input->end - ctxt->input->cur < 250)
xmlParserGrow(ctxt);;
6428 if (RAW(*ctxt->input->cur) == '?') {
6429 cur->ocur = XML_ELEMENT_CONTENT_OPT;
6430 NEXTxmlNextChar(ctxt);
6431 } else if (RAW(*ctxt->input->cur) == '*') {
6432 cur->ocur = XML_ELEMENT_CONTENT_MULT;
6433 NEXTxmlNextChar(ctxt);
6434 } else if (RAW(*ctxt->input->cur) == '+') {
6435 cur->ocur = XML_ELEMENT_CONTENT_PLUS;
6436 NEXTxmlNextChar(ctxt);
6437 } else {
6438 cur->ocur = XML_ELEMENT_CONTENT_ONCE;
6439 }
6440 GROWif (ctxt->input->end - ctxt->input->cur < 250)
xmlParserGrow(ctxt);;
6441 }
6442 SKIP_BLANKSxmlSkipBlankChars(ctxt);
6443 while ((RAW(*ctxt->input->cur) != ')') && (ctxt->instate != XML_PARSER_EOF)) {
6444 /*
6445 * Each loop we parse one separator and one element.
6446 */
6447 if (RAW(*ctxt->input->cur) == ',') {
6448 if (type == 0) type = CUR(*ctxt->input->cur);
6449
6450 /*
6451 * Detect "Name | Name , Name" error
6452 */
6453 else if (type != CUR(*ctxt->input->cur)) {
6454 xmlFatalErrMsgInt(ctxt, XML_ERR_SEPARATOR_REQUIRED,
6455 "xmlParseElementChildrenContentDecl : '%c' expected\n",
6456 type);
6457 if ((last != NULL((void*)0)) && (last != ret))
6458 xmlFreeDocElementContent(ctxt->myDoc, last);
6459 if (ret != NULL((void*)0))
6460 xmlFreeDocElementContent(ctxt->myDoc, ret);
6461 return(NULL((void*)0));
6462 }
6463 NEXTxmlNextChar(ctxt);
6464
6465 op = xmlNewDocElementContent(ctxt->myDoc, NULL((void*)0), XML_ELEMENT_CONTENT_SEQ);
6466 if (op == NULL((void*)0)) {
6467 if ((last != NULL((void*)0)) && (last != ret))
6468 xmlFreeDocElementContent(ctxt->myDoc, last);
6469 xmlFreeDocElementContent(ctxt->myDoc, ret);
6470 return(NULL((void*)0));
6471 }
6472 if (last == NULL((void*)0)) {
6473 op->c1 = ret;
6474 if (ret != NULL((void*)0))
6475 ret->parent = op;
6476 ret = cur = op;
6477 } else {
6478 cur->c2 = op;
6479 if (op != NULL((void*)0))
6480 op->parent = cur;
6481 op->c1 = last;
6482 if (last != NULL((void*)0))
6483 last->parent = op;
6484 cur =op;
6485 last = NULL((void*)0);
6486 }
6487 } else if (RAW(*ctxt->input->cur) == '|') {
6488 if (type == 0) type = CUR(*ctxt->input->cur);
6489
6490 /*
6491 * Detect "Name , Name | Name" error
6492 */
6493 else if (type != CUR(*ctxt->input->cur)) {
6494 xmlFatalErrMsgInt(ctxt, XML_ERR_SEPARATOR_REQUIRED,
6495 "xmlParseElementChildrenContentDecl : '%c' expected\n",
6496 type);
6497 if ((last != NULL((void*)0)) && (last != ret))
6498 xmlFreeDocElementContent(ctxt->myDoc, last);
6499 if (ret != NULL((void*)0))
6500 xmlFreeDocElementContent(ctxt->myDoc, ret);
6501 return(NULL((void*)0));
6502 }
6503 NEXTxmlNextChar(ctxt);
6504
6505 op = xmlNewDocElementContent(ctxt->myDoc, NULL((void*)0), XML_ELEMENT_CONTENT_OR);
6506 if (op == NULL((void*)0)) {
6507 if ((last != NULL((void*)0)) && (last != ret))
6508 xmlFreeDocElementContent(ctxt->myDoc, last);
6509 if (ret != NULL((void*)0))
6510 xmlFreeDocElementContent(ctxt->myDoc, ret);
6511 return(NULL((void*)0));
6512 }
6513 if (last == NULL((void*)0)) {
6514 op->c1 = ret;
6515 if (ret != NULL((void*)0))
6516 ret->parent = op;
6517 ret = cur = op;
6518 } else {
6519 cur->c2 = op;
6520 if (op != NULL((void*)0))
6521 op->parent = cur;
6522 op->c1 = last;
6523 if (last != NULL((void*)0))
6524 last->parent = op;
6525 cur =op;
6526 last = NULL((void*)0);
6527 }
6528 } else {
6529 xmlFatalErr(ctxt, XML_ERR_ELEMCONTENT_NOT_FINISHED, NULL((void*)0));
6530 if ((last != NULL((void*)0)) && (last != ret))
6531 xmlFreeDocElementContent(ctxt->myDoc, last);
6532 if (ret != NULL((void*)0))
6533 xmlFreeDocElementContent(ctxt->myDoc, ret);
6534 return(NULL((void*)0));
6535 }
6536 GROWif (ctxt->input->end - ctxt->input->cur < 250)
xmlParserGrow(ctxt);;
6537 SKIP_BLANKSxmlSkipBlankChars(ctxt);
6538 GROWif (ctxt->input->end - ctxt->input->cur < 250)
xmlParserGrow(ctxt);;
6539 if (RAW(*ctxt->input->cur) == '(') {
6540 int inputid = ctxt->input->id;
6541 /* Recurse on second child */
6542 NEXTxmlNextChar(ctxt);
6543 SKIP_BLANKSxmlSkipBlankChars(ctxt);
6544 last = xmlParseElementChildrenContentDeclPriv(ctxt, inputid,
6545 depth + 1);
6546 if (last == NULL((void*)0)) {
6547 if (ret != NULL((void*)0))
6548 xmlFreeDocElementContent(ctxt->myDoc, ret);
6549 return(NULL((void*)0));
6550 }
6551 SKIP_BLANKSxmlSkipBlankChars(ctxt);
6552 } else {
6553 elem = xmlParseName(ctxt);
6554 if (elem == NULL((void*)0)) {
6555 xmlFatalErr(ctxt, XML_ERR_ELEMCONTENT_NOT_STARTED, NULL((void*)0));
6556 if (ret != NULL((void*)0))
6557 xmlFreeDocElementContent(ctxt->myDoc, ret);
6558 return(NULL((void*)0));
6559 }
6560 last = xmlNewDocElementContent(ctxt->myDoc, elem, XML_ELEMENT_CONTENT_ELEMENT);
6561 if (last == NULL((void*)0)) {
6562 if (ret != NULL((void*)0))
6563 xmlFreeDocElementContent(ctxt->myDoc, ret);
6564 return(NULL((void*)0));
6565 }
6566 if (RAW(*ctxt->input->cur) == '?') {
6567 last->ocur = XML_ELEMENT_CONTENT_OPT;
6568 NEXTxmlNextChar(ctxt);
6569 } else if (RAW(*ctxt->input->cur) == '*') {
6570 last->ocur = XML_ELEMENT_CONTENT_MULT;
6571 NEXTxmlNextChar(ctxt);
6572 } else if (RAW(*ctxt->input->cur) == '+') {
6573 last->ocur = XML_ELEMENT_CONTENT_PLUS;
6574 NEXTxmlNextChar(ctxt);
6575 } else {
6576 last->ocur = XML_ELEMENT_CONTENT_ONCE;
6577 }
6578 }
6579 SKIP_BLANKSxmlSkipBlankChars(ctxt);
6580 GROWif (ctxt->input->end - ctxt->input->cur < 250)
xmlParserGrow(ctxt);;
6581 }
6582 if ((cur != NULL((void*)0)) && (last != NULL((void*)0))) {
6583 cur->c2 = last;
6584 if (last != NULL((void*)0))
6585 last->parent = cur;
6586 }
6587 if (ctxt->input->id != inputchk) {
6588 xmlFatalErrMsg(ctxt, XML_ERR_ENTITY_BOUNDARY,
6589 "Element content declaration doesn't start and stop in"
6590 " the same entity\n");
6591 }
6592 NEXTxmlNextChar(ctxt);
6593 if (RAW(*ctxt->input->cur) == '?') {
6594 if (ret != NULL((void*)0)) {
6595 if ((ret->ocur == XML_ELEMENT_CONTENT_PLUS) ||
6596 (ret->ocur == XML_ELEMENT_CONTENT_MULT))
6597 ret->ocur = XML_ELEMENT_CONTENT_MULT;
6598 else
6599 ret->ocur = XML_ELEMENT_CONTENT_OPT;
6600 }
6601 NEXTxmlNextChar(ctxt);
6602 } else if (RAW(*ctxt->input->cur) == '*') {
6603 if (ret != NULL((void*)0)) {
6604 ret->ocur = XML_ELEMENT_CONTENT_MULT;
6605 cur = ret;
6606 /*
6607 * Some normalization:
6608 * (a | b* | c?)* == (a | b | c)*
6609 */
6610 while ((cur != NULL((void*)0)) && (cur->type == XML_ELEMENT_CONTENT_OR)) {
6611 if ((cur->c1 != NULL((void*)0)) &&
6612 ((cur->c1->ocur == XML_ELEMENT_CONTENT_OPT) ||
6613 (cur->c1->ocur == XML_ELEMENT_CONTENT_MULT)))
6614 cur->c1->ocur = XML_ELEMENT_CONTENT_ONCE;
6615 if ((cur->c2 != NULL((void*)0)) &&
6616 ((cur->c2->ocur == XML_ELEMENT_CONTENT_OPT) ||
6617 (cur->c2->ocur == XML_ELEMENT_CONTENT_MULT)))
6618 cur->c2->ocur = XML_ELEMENT_CONTENT_ONCE;
6619 cur = cur->c2;
6620 }
6621 }
6622 NEXTxmlNextChar(ctxt);
6623 } else if (RAW(*ctxt->input->cur) == '+') {
6624 if (ret != NULL((void*)0)) {
6625 int found = 0;
6626
6627 if ((ret->ocur == XML_ELEMENT_CONTENT_OPT) ||
6628 (ret->ocur == XML_ELEMENT_CONTENT_MULT))
6629 ret->ocur = XML_ELEMENT_CONTENT_MULT;
6630 else
6631 ret->ocur = XML_ELEMENT_CONTENT_PLUS;
6632 /*
6633 * Some normalization:
6634 * (a | b*)+ == (a | b)*
6635 * (a | b?)+ == (a | b)*
6636 */
6637 while ((cur != NULL((void*)0)) && (cur->type == XML_ELEMENT_CONTENT_OR)) {
6638 if ((cur->c1 != NULL((void*)0)) &&
6639 ((cur->c1->ocur == XML_ELEMENT_CONTENT_OPT) ||
6640 (cur->c1->ocur == XML_ELEMENT_CONTENT_MULT))) {
6641 cur->c1->ocur = XML_ELEMENT_CONTENT_ONCE;
6642 found = 1;
6643 }
6644 if ((cur->c2 != NULL((void*)0)) &&
6645 ((cur->c2->ocur == XML_ELEMENT_CONTENT_OPT) ||
6646 (cur->c2->ocur == XML_ELEMENT_CONTENT_MULT))) {
6647 cur->c2->ocur = XML_ELEMENT_CONTENT_ONCE;
6648 found = 1;
6649 }
6650 cur = cur->c2;
6651 }
6652 if (found)
6653 ret->ocur = XML_ELEMENT_CONTENT_MULT;
6654 }
6655 NEXTxmlNextChar(ctxt);
6656 }
6657 return(ret);
6658}
6659
6660/**
6661 * xmlParseElementChildrenContentDecl:
6662 * @ctxt: an XML parser context
6663 * @inputchk: the input used for the current entity, needed for boundary checks
6664 *
6665 * DEPRECATED: Internal function, don't use.
6666 *
6667 * parse the declaration for a Mixed Element content
6668 * The leading '(' and spaces have been skipped in xmlParseElementContentDecl
6669 *
6670 * [47] children ::= (choice | seq) ('?' | '*' | '+')?
6671 *
6672 * [48] cp ::= (Name | choice | seq) ('?' | '*' | '+')?
6673 *
6674 * [49] choice ::= '(' S? cp ( S? '|' S? cp )* S? ')'
6675 *
6676 * [50] seq ::= '(' S? cp ( S? ',' S? cp )* S? ')'
6677 *
6678 * [ VC: Proper Group/PE Nesting ] applies to [49] and [50]
6679 * TODO Parameter-entity replacement text must be properly nested
6680 * with parenthesized groups. That is to say, if either of the
6681 * opening or closing parentheses in a choice, seq, or Mixed
6682 * construct is contained in the replacement text for a parameter
6683 * entity, both must be contained in the same replacement text. For
6684 * interoperability, if a parameter-entity reference appears in a
6685 * choice, seq, or Mixed construct, its replacement text should not
6686 * be empty, and neither the first nor last non-blank character of
6687 * the replacement text should be a connector (| or ,).
6688 *
6689 * Returns the tree of xmlElementContentPtr describing the element
6690 * hierarchy.
6691 */
6692xmlElementContentPtr
6693xmlParseElementChildrenContentDecl(xmlParserCtxtPtr ctxt, int inputchk) {
6694 /* stub left for API/ABI compat */
6695 return(xmlParseElementChildrenContentDeclPriv(ctxt, inputchk, 1));
6696}
6697
6698/**
6699 * xmlParseElementContentDecl:
6700 * @ctxt: an XML parser context
6701 * @name: the name of the element being defined.
6702 * @result: the Element Content pointer will be stored here if any
6703 *
6704 * DEPRECATED: Internal function, don't use.
6705 *
6706 * parse the declaration for an Element content either Mixed or Children,
6707 * the cases EMPTY and ANY are handled directly in xmlParseElementDecl
6708 *
6709 * [46] contentspec ::= 'EMPTY' | 'ANY' | Mixed | children
6710 *
6711 * returns: the type of element content XML_ELEMENT_TYPE_xxx
6712 */
6713
6714int
6715xmlParseElementContentDecl(xmlParserCtxtPtr ctxt, const xmlChar *name,
6716 xmlElementContentPtr *result) {
6717
6718 xmlElementContentPtr tree = NULL((void*)0);
6719 int inputid = ctxt->input->id;
6720 int res;
6721
6722 *result = NULL((void*)0);
6723
6724 if (RAW(*ctxt->input->cur) != '(') {
6725 xmlFatalErrMsgStr(ctxt, XML_ERR_ELEMCONTENT_NOT_STARTED,
6726 "xmlParseElementContentDecl : %s '(' expected\n", name);
6727 return(-1);
6728 }
6729 NEXTxmlNextChar(ctxt);
6730 GROWif (ctxt->input->end - ctxt->input->cur < 250)
xmlParserGrow(ctxt);;
6731 if (ctxt->instate == XML_PARSER_EOF)
6732 return(-1);
6733 SKIP_BLANKSxmlSkipBlankChars(ctxt);
6734 if (CMP7(CUR_PTR, '#', 'P', 'C', 'D', 'A', 'T', 'A')( ( ( ( ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 0 ] == '#'
&& ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 1 ] ==
'P' && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 2
] == 'C' && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur
)[ 3 ] == 'D' ) && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->
cur)[ 4 ] == 'A' ) && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input
->cur)[ 5 ] == 'T' ) && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->
input->cur)[ 6 ] == 'A' )) {
6735 tree = xmlParseElementMixedContentDecl(ctxt, inputid);
6736 res = XML_ELEMENT_TYPE_MIXED;
6737 } else {
6738 tree = xmlParseElementChildrenContentDeclPriv(ctxt, inputid, 1);
6739 res = XML_ELEMENT_TYPE_ELEMENT;
6740 }
6741 SKIP_BLANKSxmlSkipBlankChars(ctxt);
6742 *result = tree;
6743 return(res);
6744}
6745
6746/**
6747 * xmlParseElementDecl:
6748 * @ctxt: an XML parser context
6749 *
6750 * DEPRECATED: Internal function, don't use.
6751 *
6752 * Parse an element declaration. Always consumes '<!'.
6753 *
6754 * [45] elementdecl ::= '<!ELEMENT' S Name S contentspec S? '>'
6755 *
6756 * [ VC: Unique Element Type Declaration ]
6757 * No element type may be declared more than once
6758 *
6759 * Returns the type of the element, or -1 in case of error
6760 */
6761int
6762xmlParseElementDecl(xmlParserCtxtPtr ctxt) {
6763 const xmlChar *name;
6764 int ret = -1;
6765 xmlElementContentPtr content = NULL((void*)0);
6766
6767 if ((CUR(*ctxt->input->cur) != '<') || (NXT(1)ctxt->input->cur[(1)] != '!'))
6768 return(ret);
6769 SKIP(2)do { ctxt->input->cur += (2),ctxt->input->col+=(2
); if (*ctxt->input->cur == 0) xmlParserGrow(ctxt); } while
(0);
6770
6771 /* GROW; done in the caller */
6772 if (CMP7(CUR_PTR, 'E', 'L', 'E', 'M', 'E', 'N', 'T')( ( ( ( ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 0 ] == 'E'
&& ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 1 ] ==
'L' && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 2
] == 'E' && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur
)[ 3 ] == 'M' ) && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->
cur)[ 4 ] == 'E' ) && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input
->cur)[ 5 ] == 'N' ) && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->
input->cur)[ 6 ] == 'T' )) {
6773 int inputid = ctxt->input->id;
6774
6775 SKIP(7)do { ctxt->input->cur += (7),ctxt->input->col+=(7
); if (*ctxt->input->cur == 0) xmlParserGrow(ctxt); } while
(0);
6776 if (SKIP_BLANKSxmlSkipBlankChars(ctxt) == 0) {
6777 xmlFatalErrMsg(ctxt, XML_ERR_SPACE_REQUIRED,
6778 "Space required after 'ELEMENT'\n");
6779 return(-1);
6780 }
6781 name = xmlParseName(ctxt);
6782 if (name == NULL((void*)0)) {
6783 xmlFatalErrMsg(ctxt, XML_ERR_NAME_REQUIRED,
6784 "xmlParseElementDecl: no name for Element\n");
6785 return(-1);
6786 }
6787 if (SKIP_BLANKSxmlSkipBlankChars(ctxt) == 0) {
6788 xmlFatalErrMsg(ctxt, XML_ERR_SPACE_REQUIRED,
6789 "Space required after the element name\n");
6790 }
6791 if (CMP5(CUR_PTR, 'E', 'M', 'P', 'T', 'Y')( ( ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 0 ] == 'E' &&
((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 1 ] == 'M' &&
((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 2 ] == 'P' &&
((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 3 ] == 'T' ) &&
((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 4 ] == 'Y' )) {
6792 SKIP(5)do { ctxt->input->cur += (5),ctxt->input->col+=(5
); if (*ctxt->input->cur == 0) xmlParserGrow(ctxt); } while
(0);
6793 /*
6794 * Element must always be empty.
6795 */
6796 ret = XML_ELEMENT_TYPE_EMPTY;
6797 } else if ((RAW(*ctxt->input->cur) == 'A') && (NXT(1)ctxt->input->cur[(1)] == 'N') &&
6798 (NXT(2)ctxt->input->cur[(2)] == 'Y')) {
6799 SKIP(3)do { ctxt->input->cur += (3),ctxt->input->col+=(3
); if (*ctxt->input->cur == 0) xmlParserGrow(ctxt); } while
(0);
6800 /*
6801 * Element is a generic container.
6802 */
6803 ret = XML_ELEMENT_TYPE_ANY;
6804 } else if (RAW(*ctxt->input->cur) == '(') {
6805 ret = xmlParseElementContentDecl(ctxt, name, &content);
6806 } else {
6807 /*
6808 * [ WFC: PEs in Internal Subset ] error handling.
6809 */
6810 if ((RAW(*ctxt->input->cur) == '%') && (ctxt->external == 0) &&
6811 (ctxt->inputNr == 1)) {
6812 xmlFatalErrMsg(ctxt, XML_ERR_PEREF_IN_INT_SUBSET,
6813 "PEReference: forbidden within markup decl in internal subset\n");
6814 } else {
6815 xmlFatalErrMsg(ctxt, XML_ERR_ELEMCONTENT_NOT_STARTED,
6816 "xmlParseElementDecl: 'EMPTY', 'ANY' or '(' expected\n");
6817 }
6818 return(-1);
6819 }
6820
6821 SKIP_BLANKSxmlSkipBlankChars(ctxt);
6822
6823 if (RAW(*ctxt->input->cur) != '>') {
6824 xmlFatalErr(ctxt, XML_ERR_GT_REQUIRED, NULL((void*)0));
6825 if (content != NULL((void*)0)) {
6826 xmlFreeDocElementContent(ctxt->myDoc, content);
6827 }
6828 } else {
6829 if (inputid != ctxt->input->id) {
6830 xmlFatalErrMsg(ctxt, XML_ERR_ENTITY_BOUNDARY,
6831 "Element declaration doesn't start and stop in"
6832 " the same entity\n");
6833 }
6834
6835 NEXTxmlNextChar(ctxt);
6836 if ((ctxt->sax != NULL((void*)0)) && (!ctxt->disableSAX) &&
6837 (ctxt->sax->elementDecl != NULL((void*)0))) {
6838 if (content != NULL((void*)0))
6839 content->parent = NULL((void*)0);
6840 ctxt->sax->elementDecl(ctxt->userData, name, ret,
6841 content);
6842 if ((content != NULL((void*)0)) && (content->parent == NULL((void*)0))) {
6843 /*
6844 * this is a trick: if xmlAddElementDecl is called,
6845 * instead of copying the full tree it is plugged directly
6846 * if called from the parser. Avoid duplicating the
6847 * interfaces or change the API/ABI
6848 */
6849 xmlFreeDocElementContent(ctxt->myDoc, content);
6850 }
6851 } else if (content != NULL((void*)0)) {
6852 xmlFreeDocElementContent(ctxt->myDoc, content);
6853 }
6854 }
6855 }
6856 return(ret);
6857}
6858
6859/**
6860 * xmlParseConditionalSections
6861 * @ctxt: an XML parser context
6862 *
6863 * Parse a conditional section. Always consumes '<!['.
6864 *
6865 * [61] conditionalSect ::= includeSect | ignoreSect
6866 * [62] includeSect ::= '<![' S? 'INCLUDE' S? '[' extSubsetDecl ']]>'
6867 * [63] ignoreSect ::= '<![' S? 'IGNORE' S? '[' ignoreSectContents* ']]>'
6868 * [64] ignoreSectContents ::= Ignore ('<![' ignoreSectContents ']]>' Ignore)*
6869 * [65] Ignore ::= Char* - (Char* ('<![' | ']]>') Char*)
6870 */
6871
6872static void
6873xmlParseConditionalSections(xmlParserCtxtPtr ctxt) {
6874 int *inputIds = NULL((void*)0);
6875 size_t inputIdsSize = 0;
6876 size_t depth = 0;
6877
6878 while (ctxt->instate != XML_PARSER_EOF) {
6879 if ((RAW(*ctxt->input->cur) == '<') && (NXT(1)ctxt->input->cur[(1)] == '!') && (NXT(2)ctxt->input->cur[(2)] == '[')) {
6880 int id = ctxt->input->id;
6881
6882 SKIP(3)do { ctxt->input->cur += (3),ctxt->input->col+=(3
); if (*ctxt->input->cur == 0) xmlParserGrow(ctxt); } while
(0);
6883 SKIP_BLANKSxmlSkipBlankChars(ctxt);
6884
6885 if (CMP7(CUR_PTR, 'I', 'N', 'C', 'L', 'U', 'D', 'E')( ( ( ( ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 0 ] == 'I'
&& ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 1 ] ==
'N' && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 2
] == 'C' && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur
)[ 3 ] == 'L' ) && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->
cur)[ 4 ] == 'U' ) && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input
->cur)[ 5 ] == 'D' ) && ((unsigned char *) ctxt->
input->cur)[ 6 ] == 'E' )) {
6886 SKIP(7)do { ctxt->input->cur += (7),ctxt->input->col+=(7
); if (*ctxt->input->cur == 0) xmlParserGrow(ctxt); } while
(0);
6887 SKIP_BLANKSxmlSkipBlankChars(ctxt);
6888 if (RAW(*ctxt->input->cur) != '[') {
6889 xmlFatalErr(ctxt, XML_ERR_CONDSEC_INVALID, NULL((void*)0));
6890 xmlHaltParser(ctxt);
6891 goto error;
6892 }
6893 if (ctxt->input->id != id) {
6894 xmlFatalErrMsg(ctxt, XML_ERR_ENTITY_BOUNDARY,
6895 "All markup of the conditional section is"
6896 " not in the same entity\n");
6897 }
6898 NEXTxmlNextChar(ctxt);
6899
6900 if (inputIdsSize <= depth) {
6901 int *tmp;
6902
6903 inputIdsSize = (inputIdsSize == 0 ? 4 : inputIdsSize * 2);
6904 tmp = (int *) xmlRealloc(inputIds,
6905 inputIdsSize * sizeof(int));
6906 if (tmp == NULL((void*)0)) {
6907 xmlErrMemory(ctxt, NULL((void*)0));
6908 goto error;
6909 }
6910 inputIds = tmp;
6911 }
6912 inputIds[depth] = id;
6913 depth++;
6914 } else if (CMP6(CUR_PTR, 'I', 'G', 'N', 'O', 'R', 'E')( ( ( ((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 0 ] == 'I' &&
((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 1 ] == 'G' &&
((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 2 ] == 'N' &&
((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 3 ] == 'O' ) &&
((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 4 ] == 'R' ) &&
((unsigned char *) ctxt->input->cur)[ 5 ] == 'E' )) {
6915 size_t ignoreDepth = 0;
6916
6917 SKIP(6)do { ctxt->input->cur += (6),ctxt->input->col+=(6
); if (*ctxt->input->cur == 0) xmlParserGrow(ctxt); } while
(0);
6918 SKIP_BLANKSxmlSkipBlankChars(ctxt);
6919 if (RAW(*ctxt->input->cur) != '[') {
6920 xmlFatalErr(ctxt, XML_ERR_CONDSEC_INVALID, NULL((void*)0));
6921 xmlHaltParser(ctxt);
6922 goto error;
6923 }
6924 if (ctxt->input->id != id) {
6925 xmlFatalErrMsg(ctxt, XML_ERR_ENTITY_BOUNDARY,
6926 "All markup of the conditional section is"
6927 " not in the same entity\n");
6928 }
6929 NEXTxmlNextChar(ctxt);
6930
6931 while (RAW(*ctxt->input->cur) != 0) {
6932 if ((RAW(*ctxt->input->cur) == '<') && (NXT(1)ctxt->input->cur[(1)] == '!') && (NXT(2)ctxt->input->cur[(2)] == '[')) {
6933 SKIP(3)do { ctxt->input->cur += (3),ctxt->input->col+=(3
); if (*ctxt->input->cur == 0) xmlParserGrow(ctxt); } while
(0);
6934 ignoreDepth++;
6935 /* Check for integer overflow */
6936 if (ignoreDepth == 0) {
6937 xmlErrMemory(ctxt, NULL((void*)0));
6938 goto error;
6939 }
6940 } else if ((RAW(*ctxt->input->cur) == ']') && (NXT(1)ctxt->input->cur[(1)] == ']') &&
6941 (NXT(2)ctxt->input->cur[(2)] == '>')) {
6942 if (ignoreDepth == 0)
6943 break;
6944 SKIP(3)do { ctxt->input->cur += (3),ctxt->input->col+=(3
); if (*ctxt->input->cur == 0) xmlParserGrow(ctxt); } while
(0);
6945 ignoreDepth--;
6946 } else {
6947 NEXTxmlNextChar(ctxt);
6948 }
6949 }
6950
6951 if (RAW(*ctxt->input->cur) == 0) {
6952 xmlFatalErr(ctxt, XML_ERR_CONDSEC_NOT_FINISHED, NULL((void*)0));
6953 goto error;
6954 }
6955 if (ctxt->input->id != id) {
6956 xmlFatalErrMsg(ctxt, XML_ERR_ENTITY_BOUNDARY,
6957 "All markup of the conditional section is"
6958 " not in the same entity\n");
6959 }
6960 SKIP(3)do { ctxt->input->cur += (3),ctxt->input->col+=(3
); if (*ctxt->input->cur == 0) xmlParserGrow(ctxt); } while
(0);
6961 } else {
6962 xmlFatalErr(ctxt, XML_ERR_CONDSEC_INVALID_KEYWORD, NULL((void*)0));
6963 xmlHaltParser(ctxt);
6964 goto error;
6965 }
6966 } else if ((depth > 0) &&
6967 (RAW(*ctxt->input->cur) == ']') && (NXT(1)ctxt->input->cur[(1)] == ']') && (NXT(2)ctxt->input->cur[(2)] == '>')) {
6968 depth--;
6969 if (ctxt->input->id != inputIds[depth]) {
6970 xmlFatalErrMsg(ctxt, XML_ERR_ENTITY_BOUNDARY,
6971 "All markup of the conditional section is not"
6972 " in the same entity\n");
6973 }
6974 SKIP(3)do { ctxt->input->cur += (3),ctxt->input->col+=(3
); if (*ctxt->input->cur == 0) xmlParserGrow(ctxt); } while
(0);
6975 } else if ((RAW(*ctxt->input->cur) == '<') && ((NXT(1)ctxt->input->cur[(1)] == '!') || (NXT(1)ctxt->input->cur[(1)] == '?'))) {
6976 xmlParseMarkupDecl(ctxt);
6977 } else {
6978 xmlFatalErr(ctxt, XML_ERR_EXT_SUBSET_NOT_FINISHED, NULL((void*)0));
6979 xmlHaltParser(ctxt);
6980 goto error;
6981 }
6982
6983 if (depth == 0)
6984 break;
6985
6986 SKIP_BLANKSxmlSkipBlankChars(ctxt);
6987 SHRINKif (((ctxt->progressive == 0) || (ctxt->inputNr > 1)
) && (ctxt->input->cur - ctxt->input->base
> 2 * 250) && (ctxt->input->end - ctxt->
input->cur < 2 * 250)) xmlParserShrink(ctxt);;
6988 GROWif (ctxt->input->end - ctxt->input->cur < 250)
xmlParserGrow(ctxt);;
6989 }
6990
6991error:
6992 xmlFree(inputIds);
6993}
6994
6995/**
6996 * xmlParseMarkupDecl:
6997 * @ctxt: an XML parser context
6998 *
6999 * DEPRECATED: Internal function, don't use.
7000 *
7001 * Parse markup declarations. Always consumes '<!' or '<?'.
7002 *
7003 * [29] markupdecl ::= elementdecl | AttlistDecl | EntityDecl |
7004 * NotationDecl | PI | Comment
7005 *
7006 * [ VC: Proper Declaration/PE Nesting ]
7007 * Parameter-entity replacement text must be properly nested with
7008 * markup declarations. That is to say, if either the first character
7009 * or the last character of a markup declaration (markupdecl above) is
7010 * contained in the replacement text for a parameter-entity reference,
7011 * both must be contained in the same replacement text.
7012 *
7013 * [ WFC: PEs in Internal Subset ]
7014 * In the internal DTD subset, parameter-entity references can occur
7015 * only where markup declarations can occur, not within markup declarations.
7016 * (This does not apply to references that occur in external parameter
7017 * entities or to the external subset.)
7018 */
7019void
7020xmlParseMarkupDecl(xmlParserCtxtPtr ctxt) {
7021 GROWif (ctxt->input->end - ctxt->input->cur < 250)
xmlParserGrow(ctxt);;
7022 if (CUR(*ctxt->input->cur) == '<') {
7023 if (NXT(1)ctxt->input->cur[(1)] == '!') {
7024 switch (NXT(2)ctxt->input->cur[(2)]) {
7025 case 'E':
7026 if (NXT(3)ctxt->input->cur[(3)] == 'L')
7027 xmlParseElementDecl(ctxt);
7028 else if (NXT(3)ctxt->input->cur[(3)] == 'N')
7029 xmlParseEntityDecl(ctxt);
7030 else
7031 SKIP(2)do { ctxt->input->cur += (2),ctxt->input->col+=(2
); if (*ctxt->input->cur == 0) xmlParserGrow(ctxt); } while
(0);
7032 break;
7033 case 'A':
7034 xmlParseAttributeListDecl(ctxt);
7035 break;
7036 case 'N':
7037 xmlParseNotationDecl(ctxt);
7038 break;
7039 case '-':
7040 xmlParseComment(ctxt);
7041 break;
7042 default:
7043 /* there is an error but it will be detected later */
7044 SKIP(2)do { ctxt->input->cur += (2),ctxt->input->col+=(2
); if (*ctxt->input->cur == 0) xmlParserGrow(ctxt); } while
(0);
7045 break;
7046 }
7047 } else if (NXT(1)ctxt->input->cur[(1)] == '?') {
7048 xmlParsePI(ctxt);
7049 }
7050 }
7051
7052 /*
7053 * detect requirement to exit there and act accordingly
7054 * and avoid having instate overridden later on
7055 */
7056 if (ctxt->instate == XML_PARSER_EOF)
7057 return;
7058
7059 ctxt->instate = XML_PARSER_DTD;
7060}
7061
7062/**
7063 * xmlParseTextDecl:
7064 * @ctxt: an XML parser context
7065 *
7066 * DEPRECATED: Internal function, don't use.
7067 *
7068 * parse an XML declaration header for external entities
7069 *
7070 * [77] TextDecl ::= '<?xml' VersionInfo? EncodingDecl S? '?>'
7071 */
7072
7073void
7074xmlParseTextDecl(xmlParserCtxtPtr ctxt) {
7075 xmlChar *version;
7076 int oldstate;
7077
7078 /*
7079 * We know that '<?xml' is here.
7080 */
